trans-unit.target: 的 :last-of-type CSS 伪类表示其类型的一组同级元素中的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The :leftCSSpseudo-class, used with the @pageat-rule, represents all left-hand pages of a printed document.
trans-unit.target: 与 @page at-rule一起使用的 :left CSS 伪类表示打印文档的所有左侧页面。

trans-unit.source: The :linkCSSpseudo-class represents an element that has not yet been visited. It matches every unvisited <a>, <area>, or <link> element that has an href attribute.
trans-unit.target: 的 :link CSS 伪类表示尚未访问过的元素。它匹配每个具有 href 属性的未访问的 <a> ， <area> 或 <link> 元素。

trans-unit.source: The :not() exception
trans-unit.target: 的 :not() 异常

trans-unit.source: The :not() pseudo-class has a number of quirks, tricks, and unexpected results that you should be aware of before using it.
trans-unit.target: 的 :not() 伪类有一些怪癖，技巧和意想不到的结果，你应该知道使用它之前的。

trans-unit.source: The :not() pseudo-class requires a comma-separated list of one or more selectors as its argument. The list must not contain another negation selector or a pseudo-element.
trans-unit.target: 的 :not() 伪类需要以逗号分隔的一个或多个选择作为其参数的列表。该列表不得包含其他否定选择器或伪元素。

trans-unit.source: The :not()CSSpseudo-class represents elements that do not match a list of selectors. Since it prevents specific items from being selected, it is known as the negation pseudo-class.
trans-unit.target: 的 :not() CSS 伪类表示不匹配选择的列表元素。由于它会阻止选择特定项目，因此称为“ 否定”伪类。

trans-unit.source: The :not pseudo-class may not be nested, which means that :not(:not(...)) is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 的 :not 伪类不能嵌套的，这意味着 :not(:not(...)) 是无效的。

trans-unit.source: The :nth-child()CSSpseudo-class matches elements based on their position in a group of siblings.
trans-unit.target: 的 :nth-child() CSS 伪类匹配基于他们一群兄弟姐妹中位置的元素。

trans-unit.source: The :nth-last-child()CSSpseudo-class matches elements based on their position among a group of siblings, counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 的 :nth-last-child() CSS 伪类匹配基于一组兄弟姐妹，从计数结束他们之间的定位元素。

trans-unit.source: The :nth-last-of-type()CSSpseudo-class matches elements of a given type, based on their position among a group of siblings, counting from the end.
trans-unit.target: 的 :nth-last-of-type() CSS 伪类匹配基于它们的位置的一组的兄弟姐妹，计数从端部中的给定类型的元件。

trans-unit.source: The :nth-of-type()CSSpseudo-class matches elements of a given type (tag name), based on their position among a group of siblings.
trans-unit.target: 的 :nth-of-type() CSS伪类匹配基于一组兄弟姐妹中他们的位置的给定类型（标签名）的元素。

trans-unit.source: The :nth-of-type()CSSpseudo-class matches elements of a given type, based on their position among a group of siblings.
trans-unit.target: 的 :nth-of-type() CSS 伪类相匹配的给定类型的，基于一组兄弟姐妹中它们的位置的元件。

trans-unit.source: The :only-child CSS pseudo-class represents an element without any siblings. This is the same as :first-child:last-child or :nth-child(1):nth-last-child(1), but with a lower specificity.
trans-unit.target: 的 :only-child CSS 伪类表示没有任何兄弟姐妹的元素。这与 :first-child:last-child 或 :nth-child(1):nth-last-child(1) ，但特异性较低。

trans-unit.source: The :only-of-type CSS pseudo-class represents an element that has no siblings of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 的 :only-of-type CSS 伪类表示具有不同类型的兄弟姐妹的元素。

trans-unit.source: The :optionalCSSpseudo-class represents any <input>, <select>, or <textarea> element that does not have the required attribute set on it.
trans-unit.target: 的 :optional CSS 伪类表示任何 <input> ， <select> 或 <textarea> 的不具有所述元件 required 在其上属性集。

trans-unit.source: The :out-of-rangeCSSpseudo-class represents an <input> element whose current value is outside the range limits specified by the min and max attributes.
trans-unit.target: 的 :out-of-range CSS 伪类表示 <input> 元件，其电流值是由所指定的范围限制之外 min 和 max 的属性。

trans-unit.source: The :picture-in-picture pseudo-class lets you configure your stylesheets to automatically adjust the size, style, or layout of content when a video switches back and forth between picture-in-picture and traditional presentation modes.
trans-unit.target: 的 :picture-in-picture 伪类允许您配置时的视频画面，在画面和传统的展示模式之间来回切换样式表来自动调节大小，样式或内容布局。

trans-unit.source: The :picture-in-pictureCSSpseudo-class matches the element which is currently in picture-in-picture mode.
trans-unit.target: 的 :picture-in-picture CSS伪类这是目前在子母画面模式匹配元素。

trans-unit.source: The :placeholder-shownCSSpseudo-class represents any <input> or <textarea> element that is currently displaying placeholder text.
trans-unit.target: 的 :placeholder-shown CSS 伪类表示任何 <input> 或 <textarea> 的元素是当前显示占位符文本。

trans-unit.source: The :read-only pseudo-class is used to remove all the styling that makes the inputs look like clickable fields, making them look more like read-only paragraphs.The :read-write pseudo-class on the other hand is used to provide some nicer styling to the editable <textarea>.
trans-unit.target: 的 :read-only 伪类是用来清除所有，使输入类似于可点击的领域，使它们看起来更像是只读paragraphs.The造型 :read-write ，另一方面伪类是用来提供对可编辑的 <textarea> 更好的样式。

trans-unit.source: The :read-onlyCSSpseudo-class represents an element (such as input or textarea) that is not editable by the user.
trans-unit.target: 的 :read-only CSS伪类代表一个元素（如 input 或 textarea ）不是由用户进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: The :read-onlyCSSpseudo-class represents an element (such as a locked text input) that is not editable by the user.
trans-unit.target: 的 :read-only CSS 伪类代表一个元素（例如，锁定的文本输入）不是由用户进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: The :read-writeCSSpseudo-class represents an element (such as input or textarea) that is editable by the user.
trans-unit.target: 的 :read-write CSS伪类代表一个元素（如 input 或 textarea ），其是由用户编辑。

trans-unit.source: The :read-writeCSSpseudo-class represents an element (such as a text input) that is editable by the user.
trans-unit.target: 的 :read-write CSS 伪类代表一个元素（例如，文本输入），其是由用户编辑。

trans-unit.source: The :requiredCSSpseudo-class represents any <input>, <select>, or <textarea> element that has the required attribute set on it.
trans-unit.target: 的 :required CSS 伪类表示任何 <input> ， <select> 或 <textarea> 的具有元件 required 在其上属性集。

trans-unit.source: The :rightCSSpseudo-class, used with the @pageat-rule, represents all right-hand pages of a printed document.
trans-unit.target: 与 @page at-rule一起使用的 :right CSS 伪类表示打印文档的所有右侧页面。

trans-unit.source: The :rootCSS pseudo-class matches the root element of a tree representing the document. In HTML, :root represents the <html> element and is identical to the selector html, except that its specificity is higher.
trans-unit.target: 的 :root CSS 伪类表示该文档的树的根元素相匹配。在HTML中， :root 表示 <html> 元素，并且与选择器 html 相同，不同之处在于它的特异性更高。

trans-unit.source: The :scopeCSSpseudo-class represents elements that are a reference point for selectors to match against.
trans-unit.target: 的 :scope CSS 伪类表示是一个参考点，选择用于匹配元素。

trans-unit.source: The :target pseudo-class can be used to highlight the portion of a page that has been linked to from a table of contents.
trans-unit.target: 的 :target 伪类可用于突出显示已链接到从内容表的页的部分。

trans-unit.source: The :targetCSSpseudo-class represents a unique element (the target element) with an id matching the URL's fragment.
trans-unit.target: 的 :target CSS 伪类代表一个独特的元素（目标元素有） id 匹配网址的片段。

trans-unit.source: The :validCSSpseudo-class represents any <input> or other <form> element whose contents validate successfully. This allows to easily make valid fields adopt an appearance that helps the user confirm that their data is formatted properly.
trans-unit.target: 的 :valid CSS 伪类表示任何 <input> 或其他 <form> 元素，其内容验证成功。这样可以轻松使有效字段采用一种外观，以帮助用户确认其数据格式正确。

trans-unit.source: The :visitedCSSpseudo-class represents links that the user has already visited. For privacy reasons, the styles that can be modified using this selector are very limited.
trans-unit.target: 的 :visited CSS 伪类代表链接，用户已经访问。出于隐私原因，使用此选择器可以修改的样式非常有限。

trans-unit.source: The :visitedCSSpseudo-class represents links that the user has already visited. For privacy reasons, the styles that can be modified using this selector are very limited.
trans-unit.target: 的 :visited CSS伪类代表链接，用户已经访问。出于隐私原因，可以使用此选择器修改的样式非常有限。

trans-unit.source: The :where()CSSpseudo-class function takes a selector list as its argument, and selects any element that can be selected by one of the selectors in that list.
trans-unit.target: 的 :where() CSS伪类函数以一个选择器列表作为其参数，并选择能够被在该列表中的选择器中的一个被选择的任何元件。

trans-unit.source: The <background-color> value may only be included in the last layer specified.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <background-color> 值可以仅被包括在指定的最后层。

trans-unit.source: The <bg-size> value may only be included immediately after <position>, separated with the '/' character, like this: "center/80%".
trans-unit.target: 所述 <bg-size> 值可仅包括后立即 <position> ，分离与“/”字符，例如：“ center/80% ”。

trans-unit.source: The <box> value may be included zero, one, or two times. If included once, it sets both background-origin and background-clip. If it is included twice, the first occurrence sets background-origin, and the second sets background-clip.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <box> 值可以包括零个，一个或两个次。如果包含一次，它将设置 background-origin 和 background-clip 。如果包含两次，则第一个出现将设置 background-origin ，第二个出现将设置 background-clip 。

trans-unit.source: The text-overflow property deals with text overflowing in the inline direction. It takes one of two values clip, in which case content is clipped when it overflows, this is the initial value and therefore the default behaviour. We also have ellipsis which renders an ellipsis, which may be replaced with a better character for the language or writing mode in use.
trans-unit.target: 该 text-overflow 房地产交易与在一字形方向文本溢出。它采用两个值 clip 之一，在这种情况下，内容将在溢出时被裁剪，这是初始值，因此是默认行为。我们也有 ellipsis ，它表示一个省略号，对于使用的语言或书写方式，可以用更好的字符来代替。

trans-unit.source: The <gradient> type
trans-unit.target: 所述 <gradient> 型

trans-unit.source: The <h1> element's font-size is set as clamp(1.8rem, 2.5vw, 2.8rem). This means that the font-size will be set at 1.8rem, until the computed value of 2.5vw becomes greater than that of 1.8rem. At this point, font-size will be set at 2.5vw, until 2.5vw's computed value becomes greater than that of 2.8rem. At this point, the font-size will be set at 2.8rem. clamp() allows you to set a minimum and maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 的 <h1> 元素的 font-size 被设置为 clamp(1.8rem, 2.5vw, 2.8rem) 。这意味着， font-size 将被设置为 1.8rem ，直到计算值 2.5vw 变得比的更大 1.8rem 。此时， font-size 将设置为 2.5vw ，直到 2.5vw 的计算值变得大于2.8rem的值 2.8rem 。此时， font-size 将设置为 2.8rem 。 clamp() 允许您设置最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The <body> element's width is set as min(1000px, calc(70% + 100px)). This means that the width will be set at 1000px, unless the result of calc(70% + 100px) is less than 1000px, in which case it will be set to that value instead. min() allows you set a maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <body> 元素的 width 被设定为 min(1000px, calc(70% + 100px)) 。这意味着宽度将设置为 1000px ，除非 calc(70% + 100px) 的结果小于 1000px ，在这种情况下，它将被设置为该值。 min() 允许您设置最大值。

trans-unit.source: The <input type="checkbox"> element's indeterminate attribute
trans-unit.target: 所述 <input type="checkbox"> 元素的 indeterminate 属性

trans-unit.source: The <link> element is never matched by :visited.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <link> 元素是永远不会由匹配 :visited 。

trans-unit.source: The <p> element's font-size is set as max(1.2rem, 1.2vw). This means that the font-size will be set at 1.2rem, unless the computed value of 1.2vw is greater than that of 1.2rem, in which case it will be set to that value instead. max() allows you set a minimum value, which in cases like this is useful for accessibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: 的 <p> 元素的 font-size 被设置为 max(1.2rem, 1.2vw) 。这意味着 font-size 将设置为 1.2rem ，除非计算的值 1.2vw 大于 1.2rem ，在这种情况下，它将被设置为该值。 max() 允许您设置一个最小值，在这种情况下，该值对于可访问性很有用。

trans-unit.source: The exportparts attribute - Used to transitively export shadow parts from a nested shadow tree into a containing light tree.
trans-unit.target: 所述 exportparts 属性-用于传递地出口阴影部分从嵌套阴影树成含轻树。

trans-unit.source: The part attribute - Used to define parts which can be selected by the ::part() selector
trans-unit.target: 的 part 属性-用于定义能够由选择部件 ::part() 选择

trans-unit.source: The -moz-image-rect() function has similar coordinate values to rect().
trans-unit.target: 所述 -moz-image-rect() 函数类似的坐标值，以 rect() 。

trans-unit.source: The subgrid value indicates that the grid will adopt the spanned portion of its parent grid in that axis. Rather than being specified explicitly, the sizes of the grid rows/columns will be taken from the parent grid’s definition.
trans-unit.target: 的 subgrid 值表示网格将通过它的父网格的跨区部在该轴线上。而不是明确指定，而是从父网格的定义中获取网格行/列的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <filter-function>CSSdata type represents a graphical effect that can change the appearance of an input image. It is used in the filter and backdrop-filter properties.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <filter-function> CSS 数据类型表示可以改变输入图像的外观的图形效果。在 filter 和 backdrop-filter 属性中使用它。

trans-unit.source: The -moz-context-properties property can be used within privileged contexts in Firefox to share the values of specified properties of the element with a child SVG image.
trans-unit.target: 的 -moz-context-properties 属性可以在Firefox特权上下文内使用共享的小孩SVG图像元素的指定属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The -ms-hyphenate-limit-zoneCSS property is a Microsoft extension specifying the width of the hyphenation zone.
trans-unit.target: 该 -ms-hyphenate-limit-zone CSS属性是一个Microsoft扩展指定断字区的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The -ms-scroll-chainingCSS property is a Microsoft extension that specifies the scrolling behavior that occurs when a user hits the scroll limit during a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 该 -ms-scroll-chaining CSS属性是Microsoft扩展，指定当用户在操作过程中碰到的滚动限制出现滚动行为。

trans-unit.source: The -ms-scroll-limit-x-maxCSS property is a Microsoft extension that specifies the maximum value for the Element.scrollLeft property.
trans-unit.target: 该 -ms-scroll-limit-x-max CSS属性是Microsoft扩展，它指定的最大值 Element.scrollLeft 财产。

trans-unit.source: The -ms-scrollbar-base-colorCSS property is a Microsoft extension that specifies the base color of the main elements of a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 该 -ms-scrollbar-base-color CSS属性是Microsoft扩展，指定滚动条的主要内容的基本颜色。

trans-unit.source: The -ms-scrollbar-face-colorCSS property is a Microsoft extension that specifies the color of the scroll box and scroll arrows of a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 该 -ms-scrollbar-face-color CSS属性是Microsoft扩展，指定滚动按钮的颜色和滚动条滚动箭头。

trans-unit.source: The -ms-scrollbar-highlight-colorCSS property is a Microsoft extension that specifies the color of the slider tray, the top and left edges of the scroll box, and the scroll arrows of a scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 该 -ms-scrollbar-highlight-color CSS属性是Microsoft扩展指定滑动托架，顶部的颜色和滚动框的左边缘，和滚动条滚动箭头。

trans-unit.source: The ::-ms-clear CSS pseudo-element creates a clear button at the edge of an <input type="text"> text control that clears the current value. This pseudo-element is non-standard, supported only in Internet Explorer 10, Internet Explorer 11, and Microsoft Edge. The clear button is only shown on focused, non-empty text controls.
trans-unit.target: 的 ::-ms-clear CSS 伪元件在的边缘创建了一个清除按钮<INPUT TYPE =“文本”>文本控制其清除当前值。此伪元素是非标准的，仅在Internet Explorer 10，Internet Explorer 11和Microsoft Edge中受支持。清除按钮仅显示在焦点突出的非空文本控件上。

trans-unit.source: The allCSSshorthand property sets all of an element's properties (other than unicode-bidi and direction) to their initial or inherited values, or to the values specified in another stylesheet origin.
trans-unit.target: 的 all CSS 缩写属性设置所有的元件的性能（比其他的 unicode-bidi 和 direction ）到其初始或继承的值，或者在另一个样式表起源指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The allshorthandCSS property resets all of an element's properties except unicode-bidi, direction, and CSS Custom Properties. It can set properties to their initial or inherited values, or to the values specified in another stylesheet origin.
trans-unit.target: 将 all 速记CSS属性重置所有元素的属性，除了 unicode-bidi ， direction ，和CSS自定义属性。可以将属性设置为其初始值或继承的值，或设置为另一个样式表源中指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The animation-timing-functionCSS property sets how an animation progresses through the duration of each cycle.
trans-unit.target: 的 animation-timing-function CSS属性集的动画如何前进通过每个循环的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The appearance CSS property is used to display an element using platform-native styling, based on the operating system's theme. The -moz-appearance and -webkit-appearance properties are non-standard versions of this property, used (respectively) by Gecko (Firefox) and by WebKit-based (e.g., Safari) and Blink-based (e.g., Chrome, Opera) browsers to achieve the same thing. Note that Firefox and Edge also support -webkit-appearance, for compatibility reasons.
trans-unit.target: 根据操作系统的主题， appearance CSS属性用于使用平台本机样式显示元素。的 -moz-appearance 和 -webkit-appearance 特性是非标准的版本这种特性，通过壁虎（火狐）和通过（分别）使用基于WebKit（例如，Safari浏览器）和基于闪烁（例如，铬，歌剧）浏览器实现相同的目的。请注意，出于兼容性原因，Firefox和Edge也支持 -webkit-appearance 。

trans-unit.source: The clip-pathCSS property creates a clipping region that sets what part of an element should be shown. Parts that are inside the region are shown, while those outside are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 该 clip-path CSS属性创建裁剪区域应显示套什么元素的一部分。显示区域内部的部分，而隐藏外部的部分。

trans-unit.source: The contrast()CSS function adjusts the contrast of the input image. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 contrast() CSS功能调整输入图像的对比度。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The grayscale()CSS function converts the input image to grayscale. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 grayscale() CSS函数转换输入图像为灰度。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The grayscale()CSSfunction converts the input image to grayscale. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 grayscale() CSS函数转换输入图像为灰度。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The height CSS descriptor is a shorthand descriptor for setting both min-height and max-height of the viewport. By providing one viewport length value will set both, the minimum height and the maximum height, to the value provided.
trans-unit.target: 该 height CSS描述符是同时设置一个速记描述 min-height 和 max-height 视口。通过提供一个视口长度值，会将最小高度和最大高度都设置为所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: The height CSS descriptor is a shorthand descriptor for setting both min-height and max-height of the viewport. by providing one viewport length value will set both, the minimum height and the maximum height, to the value provided.
trans-unit.target: 该 height CSS描述符是同时设置一个速记描述 min-height 和 max-height 视口。通过提供一个视口长度值，会将最小高度和最大高度都设置为所提供的值。

trans-unit.source: The max-block-sizeCSS property specifies the maximum size of an element in the direction opposite that of the writing direction as specified by writing-mode. That is, if the writing direction is horizontal, then max-block-size is equivalent to max-height; if the writing direction is vertical, max-block-size is the same as max-width.
trans-unit.target: 的 max-block-size CSS属性指定方向相反的方向，该书写方向的由指定的元件的最大尺寸 writing-mode 。也就是说，如果写入方向为水平，则 max-block-size 等于 max-height ；如果写入方向是垂直的，则 max-block-size 与 max-width 相同。

trans-unit.source: The max-height CSS descriptor specifies the maximum height of the viewport of a document defined via the @viewport at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 在 max-height CSS描述符指定通过定义的文档的视口的最大高度 @viewport 的规则。

trans-unit.source: The max()CSS function lets you set the largest (most positive) value from a list of comma-separated expressions as the value of a CSS property value. The max() function can be used anywhere a <length>, <frequency>, <angle>, <time>, <percentage>,<number>, or <integer> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 该 max () CSS功能让您从逗号分隔的表达式，CSS属性值的值的列表中设置最大（最大）值。的 max() 函数可以在任何地方使用的 <length> ， <frequency> ， <angle> ， <time> ， <percentage> ， <number> 或 <integer> 是允许的。

trans-unit.source: The min-height CSS descriptor specifies the minimum height of the viewport of a document defined via the @viewport at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 的 min-height CSS描述符指定通过定义的一个文件，视区的最小高度 @viewport 在规则。

trans-unit.source: The minmax()CSS function defines a size range greater than or equal to min and less than or equal to max. It is used with CSS Grids.
trans-unit.target: 在 minmax () CSS功能限定的尺寸范围大于或等于 min 和小于或等于 max 。它与CSS网格一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The overflow-wrapCSS property applies to inline elements, setting whether the browser should insert line breaks within an otherwise unbreakable string to prevent text from overflowing its line box.
trans-unit.target: 该 overflow-wrap CSS属性适用于内联元素，设置浏览器是否原本牢不可破的字符串中插入换行符，以防止文本溢出了线箱。

trans-unit.source: The overflow-wrapCSS property sets whether the browser should insert line breaks within words to prevent text from overflowing its content box.
trans-unit.target: 该 overflow-wrap CSS属性设置浏览器是否应该词中插入换行符，以防止文本溢出其内容框。

trans-unit.source: The place-contentCSS property is a shorthand for align-content and justify-content. It can be used in any layout method which utilizes both us these alignment values.
trans-unit.target: 该 place-content 的CSS属性是一个简写为 align-content 和 justify-content 。它可以用于同时利用这些对齐值的任何布局方法中。

trans-unit.source: The place-contentCSSshorthand property allows you to align content along both the block and inline directions at once (i.e. the align-content and justify-content properties) in a relevant layout system such as Grid or Flexbox.
trans-unit.target: 该 place-content CSS速记属性可以让你同时沿着块和内嵌的方向相符的内容一次（即 align-content 和 justify-content 在相关布局系统，如属性）电网或Flexbox的。

trans-unit.source: The prefix descriptor of the @counter-style rule specifies content that will be prepended to the marker representation. If not specified, the default value will be "" (an empty string).
trans-unit.target: prefix @counter-style 规则的前缀描述符指定将在标记表示形式之前添加的内容。如果未指定，则默认值为 "" （空字符串）。

trans-unit.source: The repeat()CSS function represents a repeated fragment of the track list, allowing a large number of columns or rows that exhibit a recurring pattern to be written in a more compact form.
trans-unit.target: 的 repeat() CSS函数表示曲目列表的重复片段，允许大量的列或表现出更紧凑的形式要写入的重复图案的行。

trans-unit.source: The repeat()CSSfunction represents a repeated fragment of the track list, allowing a large number of columns or rows that exhibit a recurring pattern to be written in a more compact form.
trans-unit.target: 的 repeat() CSS函数表示曲目列表的重复片段，允许大量的列或表现出更紧凑的形式要写入的重复图案的行。

trans-unit.source: The ruby-align CSS property defines the distribution of the different ruby elements over the base.
trans-unit.target: 的 ruby-align CSS属性定义在基底的不同红宝石元素的分布。

trans-unit.source: The ruby-position CSS property defines the position of a ruby element relatives to its base element. It can be position over the element (over), under it (under), or between the characters, on their right side (inter-character).
trans-unit.target: 的 ruby-position CSS属性定义一个红宝石元件亲戚其基本元件的位置。它可以位于元素 over （上方），元素下方（ under ）或字符之间的右侧（ inter-character ）。

trans-unit.source: The suffix descriptor of the@counter-style rule specifies content that will be appended to the marker representation.
trans-unit.target: suffix @counter-style 规则的后缀描述符指定将添加到标记表示形式的内容。

trans-unit.source: The suffix descriptor of the@counter-style rule specifies content that will be appended to the marker representation. If not specified, the default value will be "\2E\20" (". ", a full stop followed by a space).
trans-unit.target: suffix @counter-style 规则的后缀描述符指定将添加到标记表示形式的内容。如果未指定，则默认值为 "\2E\20" （“。”，句号后面加一个空格）。

trans-unit.source: The url() function can be included as a value for background, background-image, list-style, list-style-image, content, cursor, border, border-image, border-image-source, mask, mask-image, src as part of a @font-face block, and @counter-style/symbol
trans-unit.target: 的 url() 函数可以被包括作为一个值 background ， background-image ， list-style ， list-style-image ， content ， cursor ， border ， border-image ， border-image-source ， mask ， mask-image ，src作为@ font-face块和@ counter-style / symbol的一部分

trans-unit.source: The url()CSSfunction is used to include a file. The parameter is an absolute URL, a relative URL, or a data URI. The url() function can be passed as a parameter of another CSS functions, like the attr() function. Depending on the property for which it is a value, the resource sought can be an image, font, or a stylesheet. The url() functional notation is the value for the <url> data type.
trans-unit.target: 该 url() CSS功能是用来包含一个文件。该参数是绝对URL，相对URL或数据URI。可以将 url() 函数作为其他CSS函数的参数传递，例如 attr() 函数。根据其为其值的属性，所寻求的资源可以是图像，字体或样式表。url（）功能符号是<url>数据类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The user-selectCSS property controls whether the user can select text. This doesn't have any effect on content loaded as chrome, except in textboxes.
trans-unit.target: 在 user-select CSS属性控制用户是否可以选择文本。除了在文本框中外，这对作为chrome加载的内容没有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: The @charset CSS at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 @charset CSS的规则。

trans-unit.source: The @charsetCSSat-rule specifies the character encoding used in the style sheet. It must be the first element in the style sheet and not be preceded by any character; as it is not a nested statement, it cannot be used inside conditional group at-rules. If several @charset at-rules are defined, only the first one is used, and it cannot be used inside a style attribute on an HTML element or inside the <style> element where the character set of the HTML page is relevant.
trans-unit.target: 该 @charset CSS 在规则规定的样式表使用的字符编码。它必须是样式表中的第一个元素，并且不能以任何字符开头。因为它不是嵌套语句，所以不能在条件组规则中使用。如果定义了多个 @charset 规则，则仅使用第一个规则，并且不能在HTML元素上的 style 属性内或与HTML页面的字符集相关的 <style> 元素内使用。

trans-unit.source: The @counter-styleCSSat-rule lets you define counter styles that are not part of the predefined set of styles. A @counter-style rule defines how to convert a counter value into a string representation.
trans-unit.target: 在 @counter-style CSS在规则允许您定义计数器样式不是预定的一系列风格的一部分。一个 @counter-style 规则定义了如何将计数器值转换为字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: The @documentCSSat-rule restricts the style rules contained within it based on the URL of the document. It is designed primarily for user-defined style sheets, though it can be used on author-defined style sheets, too.
trans-unit.target: 该 @document CSS 的规则限制了基于文档的URL中包含它的样式规则。尽管它也可以用于作者定义的样式表，但它主要是为用户定义的样式表设计的。

trans-unit.source: The @font-face at-rule may be used not only at the top level of a CSS, but also inside any CSS conditional-group at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 在 @font-face 的规则不仅可以在CSS的顶层可以使用，但也内的任何CSS条件组的规则。

trans-unit.source: The @font-faceCSSat-rule specifies a custom font with which to display text; the font can be loaded from either a remote server or a locally-installed font on the user's own computer.
trans-unit.target: 在 @font-face CSS在规则指定与要显示文本自定义字体; 可以从远程服务器或用户自己的计算机上本地安装的字体加载该字体。

trans-unit.source: The @font-faceCSSat-rule specifies a custom font with which to display text; the font can be loaded from either a remote server or the user's own computer. If the local() function is provided, specifying a font name to look for on the user's computer, and the user agent finds a match, that local font is used. Otherwise, the font resource specified using the url() function is downloaded and used.
trans-unit.target: 在 @font-face CSS 在规则指定与要显示文本自定义字体; 可以从远程服务器或用户自己的计算机上加载字体。如果提供了 local() 函数，则指定要在用户计算机上查找的字体名称，并且用户代理找到匹配项，则使用该本地字体。否则，将下载并使用通过 url() 函数指定的字体资源。

trans-unit.source: The @font-feature-values at-rule may be used either at the top level of your CSS or inside any CSS conditional-group at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 在 @font-feature-values 的规则既可以在你的CSS的顶层或任何内部使用的规则CSS条件组。

trans-unit.source: The @font-feature-valuesCSSat-rule lets you use a common name in the font-variant-alternates property for features activated differently in OpenType. This can help simplify your CSS when using multiple fonts.
trans-unit.target: 通过 @font-feature-values CSS 规则，可以在 font-variant-alternates 属性中使用公用名称来表示在OpenType中激活的功能。使用多种字体时，这可以帮助简化CSS。

trans-unit.source: The @importCSSat-rule is used to import style rules from other style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 该 @import CSS的规则用于导入其它样式表样式规则。

trans-unit.source: The @importCSSat-rule is used to import style rules from other style sheets. These rules must precede all other types of rules, except @charset rules; as it is not a nested statement, @import cannot be used inside conditional group at-rules.
trans-unit.target: 该 @import CSS 的规则用于导入其它样式表样式规则。这些规则必须位于所有其他类型的规则之前，@ @charset 规则除外；由于 @import 不是嵌套语句，因此无法在条件组规则中使用@import。

trans-unit.source: The @keyframes CSS at-rule controls the intermediate steps in a CSS animation sequence by defining styles for keyframes (or waypoints) along the animation sequence. This gives more control over the intermediate steps of the animation sequence than transitions.
trans-unit.target: 所述 @keyframes CSS 在规则通过定义沿动画序列的关键帧（或路点）样式控制在CSS动画序列中的中间步骤。与过渡相比，这可以更好地控制动画序列的中间步骤。

trans-unit.source: The @media at-rule may be placed at the top level of your code or nested inside any other conditional group at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 所述 @media 在规则可以被放置在您的代码的顶层或嵌套在任何其他在规则的条件组。

trans-unit.source: The @mediaCSSat-rule can be used to apply part of a style sheet based on the result of one or more media queries.
trans-unit.target: 该 @media CSS 的规则可用于应用基于一个或多个结果的样式表的部分媒体的质疑。

trans-unit.source: The @mediaCSSat-rule can be used to apply part of a style sheet based on the result of one or more media queries. With it, you specify a media query and a block of CSS to apply to the document if and only if the media query matches the device on which the content is being used.
trans-unit.target: 该 @media CSS的规则可用于应用基于一个或多个结果的样式表的部分媒体的质疑。使用它，您可以指定一个媒体查询和一个CSS块，当且仅当该媒体查询与正在使用其内容的设备匹配时，该CSS块才能应用于该文档。

trans-unit.source: The @namespace rule can also be used to define a namespace prefix. When a universal, type, or attribute selector is prefixed with a namespace prefix, then that selector only matches if the namespace and name of the element or attribute matches.
trans-unit.target: 该 @namespace 规则还可以用来定义一个命名空间前缀。当通用，类型或属性选择器带有名称空间前缀作为前缀时，则仅当元素或属性的名称空间和名称匹配时，该选择器才匹配。

trans-unit.source: The @page CSS at-rule is used to modify some CSS properties when printing a document.
trans-unit.target: 该 @page 在规则CSS是用来打印文档时修改某些CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: The @page CSS at-rule is used to modify some CSS properties when printing a document.You can't change all CSS properties with @page. You can only change the margins, orphans, widows, and page breaks of the document. Attempts to change any other CSS properties will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 @page 在规则CSS用于打印document.You不能改变所有的CSS属性时，修改一些CSS属性 @page 。您只能更改文档的页边距，孤儿，寡妇和分页符。尝试更改任何其他CSS属性将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The @page at-rule can be accessed via the CSS object model interface CSSPageRule.
trans-unit.target: 该 @page 在规则可以通过CSS对象模型的接口来访问 CSSPageRule 。

trans-unit.source: The @property rule represents a custom property registration directly in a stylesheet without having to run any JS. Valid @property rules result in a registered custom property, as if CSS.registerProperty had been called with equivalent parameters.
trans-unit.target: 在 @property 规则表示直接在样式表中的自定义属性登记，而无需运行任何JS。有效的 @property 规则会导致注册的自定义属性，就像使用等效参数调用 CSS.registerProperty 一样。

trans-unit.source: The @propertyCSSat-rule is part of the CSS Houdini umbrella of APIs, it allows developers to explicitly define their css custom properties, allowing for property type checking, setting default values, and define whether a property can inherit values or not.
trans-unit.target: 该 @property CSS的规则是一部分CSS胡迪尼的API的雨伞，它允许开发者明确地定义他们的 css custom properties ，允许物业类型检查，设置默认值，并定义属性是否可以继承值与否。

trans-unit.source: The @supports at-rule associates a block of statements with a supports condition. The supports condition consists of one or more name-value pairs combined by conjunctions (and), disjunctions (or), and/or negations (not). Precedence of operators can be defined with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 该 @supports 在规则与关联一个语句块的支撑条件。支持条件由一个或多个名称/值对组成，这些名称/值对由连词（ and ），析取词（ or ）和/或取反（ not ）组合而成。运算符的优先级可以用括号定义。

trans-unit.source: The @supports rule tests to see if the browser can parse one or more property/value pairs, and therefore if it claims to support the feature(s). If the property and value pair is understood by the browser it returns a positive response. Therefore feature queries cannot be used to check if a browser supports a thing properly, and without bugs!
trans-unit.target: 所述 @supports 排除测试，以查看是否在浏览器可以解析的一个或多个属性/值对，因此，如果它声称支持的特征（一个或多个）。如果浏览器可以理解属性和值对，则它将返回肯定响应。因此，功能查询不能用于检查浏览器是否正确支持某事物，并且没有错误！

trans-unit.source: The @supportsCSSat-rule lets you specify declarations that depend on a browser's support for one or more specific CSS features. This is called a feature query. The rule may be placed at the top level of your code or nested inside any other conditional group at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 @supports CSS 的规则让你指定依赖于浏览器中的一个或多个特定的CSS功能的支持声明。这称为功能查询。规则可以放在代码的顶层，也可以嵌套在任何其他条件组中。

trans-unit.source: The @supportsCSSat-rule lets you specify declarations that depend on a browser's support for one or more specific CSS features. This is called a feature query. The rule may be placed at the top level of your code or nested inside any other conditional group at-rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 @supports CSS的规则让你指定依赖于浏览器中的一个或多个特定的CSS功能的支持声明。这称为功能查询。规则可以放在代码的顶层，也可以嵌套在任何其他条件组中。

trans-unit.source: The additive-symbols descriptor lets you specify symbols when the value of a counter system descriptor is additive. The additive-symbols descriptor defines additive tuples, each of which is a pair containing a symbol and a non-negative integer weight. The additive system is used to construct sign-value numbering systems such as Roman numerals.
trans-unit.target: 该 additive-symbols 描述符，可以指定符号时，计数器的值 system 描述符是 additive 。所述 additive-symbols 描述符定义的添加剂的元组，其中的每一个是包含一个符号和一个非负整数权重的一对。加性系统用于构造符号值编号系统，例如罗马数字。

trans-unit.source: The additive-symbols descriptor lets you specify symbols when the value of a counter system descriptor is additive. The additive-symbols descriptor defines additive tuples, each of which is a pair containing a symbol and a non-negative integer weight. The additive system is used to construct sign-value numbering systems such as Roman numerals.

The align-content property is applied to the grid container as it works on the entire grid. The default behavior in grid layout is start, which is why our grid tracks are in the top left corner of the grid, aligned against the start grid lines:
trans-unit.target: 该 align-content ，因为它适用于整个网格属性应用于网格容器。网格布局中的默认行为是 start ，这就是为什么我们的网格轨迹位于网格的左上角并与起始网格线对齐的原因：

trans-unit.source: The align-content property takes the following values:
trans-unit.target: 该 align-content 属性接受以下值：

trans-unit.source: The align-items and align-self properties control alignment of our flex items on the cross axis, down the columns if flex-direction is row and along the row if flex-direction is column.
trans-unit.target: 所述 align-items 和 align-self 我们的柔性物品的上横轴属性控制对准，向下列如果 flex-direction 是 row 和沿行如果 flex-direction 是 column 。

trans-unit.source: The align-items property sets the align-self property on all of the flex items as a group. This means you can explicitly declare the align-self property to target a single item. The align-self property accepts all of the same values as align-items plus a value of auto, which will reset the value to that which is defined on the flex container.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-items 属性设置 align-self 上所有的柔性项目作为一个群体的财产。这意味着您可以显式声明 align-self 属性以定位单个项目。该 align-self 属性接受所有相同值的 align-items 加的价值 auto ，这将值重置为它是Flex容器上定义。

trans-unit.source: The align-selfCSS property aligns flex items of the current flex line overriding the align-items value. If any of the item's cross-axis margin is set to auto, then align-self is ignored. In Grid layout align-self aligns the item inside the grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-self CSS特性来使当前柔性线路重载的柔性物品 align-items 值。如果项目的任何横轴边距设置为 auto ，则将忽略 align-self 。在“网格布局”中， align-self 在网格区域内对齐项目。

trans-unit.source: The align-selfCSS property overrides a grid or flex item's align-items value. In Grid, it aligns the item inside the grid area. In Flexbox, it aligns the item on the cross axis.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-self CSS属性将覆盖网格或Flex项目的 align-items 值。在Grid中，它将项目对齐到grid区域内。在Flexbox中，它使项目在横轴上对齐。

trans-unit.source: The align-tracks CSS property sets the alignment in the masonry axis for grid containers that have masonry in their block axis.
trans-unit.target: 该 align-tracks CSS属性设置砌体对齐对于具有网格容器轴线砖石在他们的块轴。

trans-unit.source: The align-tracks property allows for the alignment of items in grid containers with masonry in their block axis. The property aligns the items within their track, much in the way flex layout works. The property takes the same values as align-content, however you can specify multiple values to have different alignment values per track on the grid axis.
trans-unit.target: 在 align-tracks 属性允许物品在网格容器在它们的块轴线砌筑的对准。该属性使项目在其轨道内对齐，这与flex布局的工作方式非常相似。该属性使用与 align-content 相同的值，但是您可以指定多个值以在网格轴上的每个轨道具有不同的对齐值。

trans-unit.source: The all property is specified as one of the CSS global keyword values. Note that none of these values affect the unicode-bidi and direction properties.
trans-unit.target: 将 all 财产被指定为CSS全球关键字值之一。请注意，这些值均不影响 unicode-bidi 和 direction 属性。

trans-unit.source: The always value of page-break-* was implemented by browsers as a page break, and not as a column break. Therefore the aliasing is to page, rather than the always value in the Level 4 spec.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将 page-break-* 的 always 值实现为分页符，而不是列分隔符。因此，别名是 page ，而不是Level 4规范中的 always 值。

trans-unit.source: The and keyword combines a media feature with a media type or other media features. This example combines two media features to restrict styles to landscape-oriented devices with a width of at least 30 ems:
trans-unit.target: 在 and 关键字结合了媒体功能与媒体类型或者其他媒体功能。此示例结合了两种媒体功能，以将样式限制为宽度至少为30 em的面向景观的设备：

trans-unit.source: The and operator
trans-unit.target: 在 and 运营商

trans-unit.source: The and operator creates a new expression from the conjunction of two shorter expressions. It returns true only if both of the shorter expressions are also true. The following example returns true if and only if the two shorter expressions are simultaneously true:
trans-unit.target: 的 and 运营商创建一个从两个较短表达式的组合，新的表达。仅当两个较短的表达式也都为true时，它才返回true。以下示例仅当两个较短的表达式同时为true时，才返回true：

trans-unit.source: The and operator is used for combining multiple media features together into a single media query, requiring each chained feature to return true in order for the query to be true. It is also used for joining media features with media types.
trans-unit.target: 的 and 运算符用于组合多个媒体设有在一起成为一个单一的媒体的查询，要求每个链式特征，以便返回true为查询是真实的。它还用于将媒体功能与媒体类型结合在一起。

trans-unit.source: The animation-delayCSS property sets when an animation starts. The animation can start later, immediately from its beginning, or immediately and partway through the animation.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-delay CSS动画开始时的属性集。动画可以在稍后，从其开始立即开始或在动画中途立即开始。

trans-unit.source: The animation-delayCSS property specifies the amount of time to wait from applying the animation to an element before beginning to perform the animation. The animation can start later, immediately from its beginning, or immediately and partway through the animation.
trans-unit.target: 的 animation-delay CSS属性从开始执行动画之前施加所述动画的元素指定等待的时间量。动画可以在稍后，从其开始立即开始或在动画中途立即开始。

trans-unit.source: The animation-directionCSS property sets whether an animation should play forward, backward, or alternate back and forth between playing the sequence forward and backward.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-direction CSS属性集的动画是否应该打的顺序向前和向后之间起到前进，后退，或来回交替。

trans-unit.source: The animation-directionCSS property sets whether an animation should play forwards, backwards, or alternating back and forth.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-direction CSS属性集的动画是否应该扮演向前，向后，或交替来回。

trans-unit.source: The animation-durationCSS property sets the length of time that an animation takes to complete one cycle.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-duration CSS属性设置的时间长度的动画需要完成一个周期。

trans-unit.source: The animation-fill-modeCSS property sets how a CSS animation applies styles to its target before and after its execution.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-fill-mode CSS属性设置一个CSS动画如何应用样式到其目标之前和执行之后。

trans-unit.source: The animation-iteration-count property is specified as one or more comma-separated values.
trans-unit.target: 的 animation-iteration-count 属性指定为一个或多个逗号分隔的值。

trans-unit.source: The animation-iteration-countCSS property sets the number of times an animation cycle should be played before stopping.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-iteration-count CSS属性设置动画周期应该停止前播放的次数。

trans-unit.source: The animation-iteration-countCSS property sets the number of times an animation sequence should be played before stopping.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-iteration-count CSS属性设置动画序列应该停止前播放的次数。

trans-unit.source: The animation-nameCSS property sets one or more animations to apply to an element. Each name is an @keyframes at-rule that sets the property values for the animation sequence.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-name CSS属性设置一个或多个动画应用到的元素。每个名称都是一个 @keyframes 规则，该规则设置动画序列的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The animation-nameCSS property specifies the names of one or more @keyframes at-rules describing the animation or animations to apply to the element.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-name CSS属性指定的一个或多个的名字 @keyframes 在规则描述的动画或动画应用到元素。

trans-unit.source: The animation-play-stateCSS property sets whether an animation is running or paused.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation-play-state CSS属性集是否动画正在运行或暂停。

trans-unit.source: The animation-timing-functionCSS property sets how an animation progresses through the duration of each cycle.
trans-unit.target: 的 animation-timing-function CSS属性集的动画如何前进通过每个循环的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The animation property is specified as one or more single animations, separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 的 animation 属性被指定为一个或多个单动画，用逗号分开。

trans-unit.source: The animationshorthandCSS property applies an animation between styles. It is a shorthand for animation-name, animation-duration, animation-timing-function, animation-delay, animation-iteration-count, animation-direction, animation-fill-mode, and animation-play-state.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation 速记CSS属性适用风格之间的动画。它是 animation-name ， animation-duration ， animation-timing-function ， animation-delay ， animation-iteration-count ， animation-direction ， animation-fill-mode 和 animation-play-state 的简写。

trans-unit.source: The animationshorthandCSS property sets an animated transition between styles. It is a shorthand for animation-name, animation-duration, animation-timing-function, animation-delay, animation-iteration-count, animation-direction, animation-fill-mode, and animation-play-state.
trans-unit.target: 该 animation 速记CSS属性设置样式之间动画转换。它是 animation-name ， animation-duration ， animation-timing-function ， animation-delay ， animation-iteration-count ， animation-direction ， animation-fill-mode 和 animation-play-state 的简写。

trans-unit.source: The any-hover feature is specified as a keyword value chosen from the list below.

trans-unit.source: The any-hoverCSSmedia feature can be used to test whether any available input mechanism can hover over elements.
trans-unit.target: 的 any-hover CSS 媒体功能可用于测试是否任何可用的输入机构可以元素悬停。

trans-unit.source: The any-pointer feature is specified as a keyword value chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 将 any-pointer 功能指定为从下面的列表中选择的关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The any-pointer media feature
trans-unit.target: 在 any-pointer 媒体功能

trans-unit.source: The any-pointerCSSmedia feature tests whether the user has any pointing device (such as a mouse), and if so, how accurate it is.
trans-unit.target: 的 any-pointer CSS 媒体特征测试用户是否具有任何定点设备（例如鼠标），以及如果是，如何准确它是。

trans-unit.source: The aspect-ratio feature is specified as a <ratio> value representing the width-to-height aspect ratio of the viewport. It is a range feature, meaning you can also use the prefixed min-aspect-ratio and max-aspect-ratio variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 高 aspect-ratio 特征被指定为 <ratio> 值，代表视口的宽高比。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用前缀的 min-aspect-ratio 和 max-aspect-ratio 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The aspect-ratioCSS property sets a preferred aspect ratio for the box, which will be used in the calculation of auto sizes and some other layout functions.
trans-unit.target: 的 aspect-ratio CSS属性设置一个优选的纵横比为箱体，其将在汽车的尺寸和其他一些布局功能的计算中使用。

trans-unit.source: The aspect-ratioCSSmedia feature can be used to test the aspect ratio of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 的 aspect-ratio CSS 媒体功能可用于测试的纵横比的视口。

trans-unit.source: The attr()CSS function is used to retrieve the value of an attribute of the selected element and use it in the style sheet. It can also be used on pseudo-elements, in which case the value of the attribute on the pseudo-element's originating element is returned.
trans-unit.target: 的 attr() CSS功能用于检索所选择的元素的属性的值，并且它在样式表中使用。它也可以用在伪元素上，在这种情况下，将返回伪元素的原始元素上的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The attr()CSSfunction is used to retrieve the value of an attribute of the selected element and use it in the stylesheet. It can also be used on pseudo-elements, in which case the value of the attribute on the pseudo-element's originating element is returned.
trans-unit.target: 的 attr() CSS功能用于检索所选择的元素的属性的值，并且它在样式表中使用。它也可以在伪元素上使用，在这种情况下，将返回伪元素的原始元素上的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The aural CSS media type—which has been deprecated in favor of the speech media type—was used to specify a block of CSS that applied only when the content is being presented using a speech synthesis device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 aural CSS媒体类型已赞成的被弃用 speech 类型被用来指定仅仅当正在使用语音合成装置呈现的内容CSS的块介质。

trans-unit.source: The auralCSSmedia type is used for devices that have speech output capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 该 aural CSS媒体类型是用于具有语音输出功能的设备。

trans-unit.source: The auto value indicates a custom outline style — typically a style [that] is either a user interface default for the platform, or perhaps a style that is richer than can be described in detail in CSS, e.g. a rounded edge outline with semi-translucent outer pixels that appears to glow.
trans-unit.target: 的 auto 值表示自定义轮廓样式- 通常是式[即]是无论是对所述平台的用户界面默认，或者一个风格比可以详细在CSS描述更丰富的，例如圆形边缘轮廓与半透光发光的外部像素。

trans-unit.source: The auto value is not supported in quirks mode.
trans-unit.target: 在 auto 值不怪癖模式的支持。

trans-unit.source: The auto value is often a very complex case. The specification recommends not animating from and to auto. Some user agents, like those based on Gecko, implement this requirement and others, like those based on WebKit, are less strict. Using animations with auto may lead to unpredictable results, depending on the browser and its version, and should be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 在 auto 值往往是一个非常复杂的情况。规范建议不要从 auto 到auto设置动画。一些用户代理（例如基于Gecko的用户代理）实现了此要求，而其他用户代理（例如基于WebKit的用户代理）则不太严格。根据浏览器及其版本，将动画与 auto 一起使用可能会导致不可预测的结果，因此应避免使用。

trans-unit.source: The auto value was equivalent to horizontal.
trans-unit.target: 在 auto 价值相当于 horizontal 。

trans-unit.source: The backdrop-filterCSS property lets you apply graphical effects such as blurring or color shifting to the area behind an element. Because it applies to everything behind the element, to see the effect you must make the element or its background at least partially transparent.
trans-unit.target: 的 backdrop-filter CSS属性可以应用图形效果如模糊或色移到元件后面的区域。因为它适用于元素后面的所有内容，所以要查看效果，必须使元素或其背景至少部分透明。

trans-unit.source: The backface-visibility property is specified as one of the keywords listed below.

trans-unit.source: The backface-visibilityCSS property sets whether the back face of an element is visible when turned towards the user.
trans-unit.target: 在 backface-visibility CSS属性集时，向用户打开一个元素的背面是否可见。

trans-unit.source: The background-attachment property is specified as one of the keyword values from the list below.

trans-unit.source: The background-clip CSS property sets whether an element's background <color> or <image> extends underneath its border.

trans-unit.source: The background-clipCSS property sets whether an element's background extends underneath its border box, padding box, or content box.

trans-unit.source: The background-originCSS property sets the background positioning area. In other words, it sets the origin position of an image set with the background-image property.
trans-unit.target: 该 background-origin 的CSS属性设置背景设定区域。换句话说，它使用 background-image 属性设置图像集的原点位置。

trans-unit.source: The background-originCSS property sets the background's origin: from the border start, inside the border, or inside the padding.
trans-unit.target: 该 background-origin 的CSS属性设置背景的起源：从边境开始，边框内，或填充内。

trans-unit.source: The background-position-x property is specified as one or more values, separated by commas.

trans-unit.source: The background-position-xCSS property sets the initial horizontal position for each background image. The position is relative to the position layer set by background-origin.
trans-unit.target: 该 background-position-x CSS属性设置为每个背景图像的初始水平位置。该位置相对于由 background-origin 设置的位置层。

trans-unit.source: The background-position-y property is specified as one or more values, separated by commas.

trans-unit.source: The background-position-yCSS property sets the initial vertical position, relative to the background position layer defined by background-origin, for each defined background image.

trans-unit.source: The background-position property is specified as one or more <position> values, separated by commas.

trans-unit.source: The background-repeatCSS property sets how background images are repeated. A background image can be repeated along the horizontal and vertical axes, or not repeated at all.

trans-unit.source: The background-size property is specified in one of the following ways:

trans-unit.source: The background-sizeCSS property sets the size of the element's background image. The image can be left to its natural size, stretched, or constrained to fit the available space.
trans-unit.target: 该 background-size CSS属性设置元素的背景图像的大小。图像可以保留其自然大小，可以拉伸或约束以适合可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The bleedCSSat-rule descriptor, used with the @page at-rule, specifies the extent of the page bleed area outside the page box. This property only has effect if crop marks are enabled using the marks property.

trans-unit.source: The blink value does not have any effect.

trans-unit.source: The block-size property takes the same values as the width and height properties.

trans-unit.source: The block-sizeCSS property defines the horizontal or vertical size of an element's block, depending on its writing mode. It corresponds to either the width or the height property, depending on the value of writing-mode.
trans-unit.target: 的 block-size CSS属性定义一个元素的块的水平或垂直尺寸，这取决于它的写入模式。它取决于 width 或 height 属性，具体取决于 writing-mode 的值。

trans-unit.source: The blur()CSS function applies a Gaussian blur to the input image. Its result is a <filter-function>.

trans-unit.source: The border-block-colorCSS property defines the color of the logical block borders of an element, which maps to a physical border color depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-color and border-bottom-color, or border-right-color and border-left-color property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-block-color CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到依赖于要素的写作模式，方向性和文本方向的物理边框颜色的逻辑块边框的颜色。它对应于 border-top-color 和 border-bottom-color 或 border-right-color 和 border-left-color 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The border-block-end-colorCSS property defines the color of the logical block-end border of an element, which maps to a physical border color depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. trans-unit.source: The border-bottom-color CSS property sets the color of an element's bottom border. The color can also be set with the shorthand CSS properties border-color or border-bottom.

trans-unit.target: 在 border-bottom 速记CSS属性设置元素的下边界。它设置 border-bottom-width ， border-bottom-style 和 border-bottom-color 的值。

trans-unit.source: The border-box value is the shape defined by the outside border edge. This shape follows all of the normal border radius shaping rules for the outside of the border. You still have a border, even if you have not used the CSS border property. In this case it will be the same as padding-box, the shape defined by the outside padding edge.
trans-unit.target: 所述 border-box 的值是由外部边界边缘限定的形状。此形状遵循边界外部的所有正常边界半径成形规则。即使您没有使用CSS border 属性，您仍然具有边框。在这种情况下，它将与 padding-box 相同，后者是由外部padding边缘定义的形状。

trans-unit.source: The border-collapse property alters the appearance of the <table> HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 的 border-collapse 属性改变的外观 <table> HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: The border-collapse property is specified as a single keyword, which may be chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 的 border-collapse 属性被规定为单个关键字，其可以从以下列表中选择。

trans-unit.source: The border-collapseCSS property sets whether cells inside a <table> have shared or separate borders.
trans-unit.target: 的 border-collapse CSS属性集是否在细胞内 <table> 具有共享或单独的边框。

trans-unit.source: The border-color property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-color 属性可以使用一个，两个，三个或四个值来指定。

trans-unit.source: The border-color shorthand CSS property sets the color of all sides of an element's border.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-color 速记CSS属性设置元素边框的所有边的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The border-colorshorthandCSS property sets the color of an element's border.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-color 速记CSS属性设置元素的边框的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The border-end-end-radiusCSS property defines a logical border radius on an element, which maps to a physical border radius that depends on on the element's writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation. This is useful when building styles to work regardless of the text orientation and writing mode.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-end-end-radius CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于此元素的物理边界半径上的逻辑边界半径 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 。当构建样式以使其工作而与文本方向和书写模式无关时，此功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: The border-end-start-radiusCSS property defines a logical border radius on an element, which maps to a physical border radius depending on the element's writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation. This is useful when building styles to work regardless of the text orientation and writing mode.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-end-start-radius CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到依赖于要素的物理边界半径上的逻辑边界半径 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 。当构建样式以使其工作而与文本方向和书写模式无关时，此功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-outset property may be specified as one, two, three, or four values. Each value is a <length> or <number>. Negative values are invalid and will cause the border-image-outset declaration to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image-outset 特性可以被指定为一个，两个，三个或四个值。每个值都是一个 <length> 或 <number> 。负值无效，并且将导致 border-image-outset 声明被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-outset property may be specified as one, two, three, or four values. Each value is a <length> or <number>. Negative values are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image-outset 特性可以被指定为一个，两个，三个或四个值。每个值都是一个 <length> 或 <number> 。负值无效。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-outsetCSS property sets the distance by which an element's border image is set out from its border box.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image-outset CSS属性设置，通过该元素的距离边界图像设置为从它的边界框而出。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-repeat property may be specified using one or two values chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 border-image-repeat 属性可以使用从以下的值的列表中选择的一个或两个的值来指定。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-repeatCSS property defines how the edge regions of a source image are adjusted to fit the dimensions of an element's border image.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image-repeat CSS属性定义如何在边缘区域的源图像的调整，以适应一个元素的尺寸边界图像。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-slice property may be specified using one to four <number-percentage> values to represent the position of each image slice. Negative values are invalid; values greater than their corresponding dimension are clamped to 100%.
trans-unit.target: 所述 border-image-slice 属性可使用一至四个指定 <number-percentage> 值来表示每个图像切片的位置。负值无效；大于其相应尺寸的值将固定为 100% 。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-sliceCSS property divides the image specified by border-image-source into regions. These regions form the components of an element's border image.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image-slice CSS属性将图像指定由 border-image-source 成区域。这些区域构成元素边界图像的组成部分。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-sourceCSS property sets the source image used to create an element's border image.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image-source CSS属性设置用于创建元素的源图像边界的图像。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-width property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 border-image-width 属性可以使用一个，两个，三个，或从下面的值的列表中选择的四个值来指定。

trans-unit.source: The border-image-widthCSS property sets the width of an element's border image.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image-width CSS属性设置元素的宽度边界图像。

trans-unit.source: The border-image property may be specified with anywhere from one to five of the values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image 特性可一到下面列出的值五个任何地方来指定。

trans-unit.source: The border-imageCSS property draws an image around a given element. It replaces the element's regular border.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image 的CSS属性围绕给定元素绘制的图像。它替换了元素的常规边框。

trans-unit.source: The border-imageCSS property draws an image in place of an element's border-style.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-image 的CSS属性代替元素的绘制图像 border-style 。

trans-unit.source: The border-inline-colorCSS property defines the color of the logical inline borders of an element, which maps to a physical border color depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-color and border-bottom-color, or border-right-color and border-left-color property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-inline-color CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到依赖于要素的写作模式，方向性和文本方向的物理边框颜色的逻辑内嵌边框的颜色。它对应于 border-top-color 和 border-bottom-color 或 border-right-color 和 border-left-color 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The border-inline-end-colorCSS property defines the color of the logical inline-end border of an element, which maps to a physical border color depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-color, border-right-color, border-bottom-color, or border-left-color property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-inline-end-color CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到依赖于要素的写作模式，方向性和文本方向的物理边框颜色的逻辑直列端边界的颜色。它对应于 border-top-color ， border-right-color ， border-bottom-color 或 border-left-color 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The border-inline-end-styleCSS property defines the style of the logical inline end border of an element, which maps to a physical border style depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-style, border-right-style, border-bottom-style, or border-left-style property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-inline-end-style CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到依赖于要素的写作模式，方向性和文本方向的物理边框样式的逻辑直列结束边框的样式。它对应于 border-top-style ， border-right-style ， border-bottom-style 或 border-left-style 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The border-inline-end-widthCSS property defines the width of the logical inline-end border of an element, which maps to a physical border width depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-width, border-right-width, border-bottom-width, or border-left-width property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-inline-end-width CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到物理边界宽度取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的逻辑直列端边界的宽度。它对应于 border-top-width ， border-right-width ， border-bottom-width 或 border-left-width 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.target: 在 border-inline-end CSS属性是一个简写属性在样式表一个单一的地方设置单独的逻辑直列端边界属性值。

trans-unit.source: The border-inline-start-colorCSS property defines the color of the logical inline start border of an element, which maps to a physical border color depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-color, border-right-color, border-bottom-color, or border-left-color property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.

trans-unit.source: The border-inline-start-styleCSS property defines the style of the logical inline start border of an element, which maps to a physical border style depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the border-top-style, border-right-style, border-bottom-style, or border-left-style property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.

trans-unit.source: The border-left-color CSS property sets the color of an element's left border. It can also be set with the shorthand CSS properties border-color or border-left.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-left-color CSS属性设置元素的左边的颜色 border 。也可以使用CSS的简写属性 border-color 或 border-left 进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The border-left-style property is specified as a single keyword chosen from those available for the border-style property.

trans-unit.source: The border-left-styleCSS property sets the line style of an element's left border.

trans-unit.source: The border-left-widthCSS property sets the width of the left border of an element.

trans-unit.source: The border-leftCSS property sets an element's left border. It's a shorthand for border-left-width, border-left-style, and border-left-color.

trans-unit.source: The border-leftshorthandCSS property sets all the properties of an element's left border.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-left 速记CSS属性设置元素的左的所有属性的边界。

trans-unit.source: The border-radius property does not apply to table elements when border-collapse is collapse.

trans-unit.source: The border-radius values are also supported, this means that you can have something in your page with a curved border, and your shape can follow the created shape.

trans-unit.source: The border-radiusCSS property rounds the corners of an element's outer border edge. You can set a single radius to make circular corners, or two radii to make elliptical corners.
trans-unit.target: 该 border-radius CSS属性回合元素的外边框边缘的角落。您可以设置一个半径来制作圆角，或者设置两个半径来制作椭圆角。

trans-unit.source: The border-right-color CSS property sets the color of an element's right border. This property can also be set with the shorthand CSS properties border-color or border-right.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-right-color CSS属性设置元素的右边的颜色 border 。也可以使用CSS速记属性 border-color 或 border-right 设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: The border-right-color CSS property sets the color of an element's right border. It can also be set with the shorthand CSS properties border-color or border-right.

trans-unit.source: The border-right-style property is specified as a single keyword chosen from those available for the border-style property.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-right-style 属性指定为可从能够选择的单个关键字 border-style 属性。

trans-unit.target: 在 border-right-style CSS属性设置元素的右边的线条样式 border 。

trans-unit.target: 在 border-right-style CSS属性设置元素的右边的线条样式 border 。

trans-unit.source: The border-right-widthCSS property sets the width of the right border of a box.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-right-width CSS属性设置一个框的右边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The border-right-widthCSS property sets the width of the right border of an element.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-right-width CSS属性设置元素的右边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The border-rightCSS property is a shorthand that sets border-right-width, border-right-style, and border-right-color. These properties set an element's right border.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-right 的CSS属性是一个速记，设置 border-right-width ， border-right-style ，和 border-right-color 。这些属性设置元素的右边 border 。

trans-unit.source: The border-rightshorthandCSS property sets all the properties of an element's right border.

trans-unit.source: The border-spacing CSS property sets the distance between the borders of adjacent <table> cells. This property applies only when border-collapse is separate.
trans-unit.target: 的 border-spacing CSS属性设置相邻的边之间的距离 <table> 细胞。此属性仅在 border-collapse 为 separate 时适用。

trans-unit.source: The border-spacing property alters the appearance of the <table> HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 的 border-spacing 属性改变的外观 <table> HTML元素。

trans-unit.source: The border-spacing property may be specified as either one or two values.
trans-unit.target: 可以将 border-spacing 属性指定为一个或两个值。

trans-unit.source: The border-spacing value is also used along the outside edge of the table, where the distance between the table's border and the cells in the first/last column or row is the sum of the relevant (horizontal or vertical) border-spacing and the relevant (top, right, bottom, or left) padding on the table.
trans-unit.target: 的 border-spacing 值也沿着台的外部边缘，其中表的边框和在第一/最后一列或行中的单元之间的距离是相关（水平或垂直）的总和使用 border-spacing 和表格上相关的（顶部，右侧，底部或左侧） padding 。

trans-unit.source: The border-start-end-radiusCSS property defines a logical border radius on an element, which maps to a physical border radius depending on the element's writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation. This is useful when building styles to work regardless of the text orientation and writing mode.

This is useful when building styles to work regardless of the text orientation and writing mode.

trans-unit.source: The border-style property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values.

trans-unit.source: The border-styleCSS property is a shorthand property that sets the line style for all four sides of an element's border.

trans-unit.source: The border-top-color CSS property sets the color of an element's top border. Note that in many cases the shorthand CSS properties border-color or border-top are more convenient and preferable.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-top-color CSS属性设置元素的顶部的颜色 border 。请注意，在许多情况下，速记CSS属性 border-color 或 border-top 更方便且更可取。

trans-unit.target: 在 border-top-color CSS属性设置元素的顶部的颜色边框。也可以使用CSS的简写属性 border-color 或 border-top 进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The border-top-left-radius CSS property rounds the top-left corner of an element.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-top-left-radius CSS属性查房元素的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The border-top-left-radiusCSS property rounds the top-left corner of an element by specifying the radius (or the radius of the semi-major and semi-minor axes) of the ellipse defining the curvature of the corner.
trans-unit.target: 所述 border-top-left-radius CSS属性轮通过指定椭圆限定角部的曲率半径（或半长轴和半短轴的半径）的元件的左上角。

trans-unit.source: The border-top-right-radius CSS property rounds the top-right corner of an element.

trans-unit.target: 的 border-top-right-radius CSS属性轮通过指定椭圆限定角部的曲率半径（或半长轴和半短轴的半径）的元素的右上角。

trans-unit.source: The border-top-style property is specified as a single keyword chosen from those available for the border-style property.

trans-unit.source: The border-top-styleCSS property sets the line style of an element's top border.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-top-style CSS属性设置元素的顶部的线条样式 border 。

trans-unit.source: The border-top-styleCSS property sets the line style of an element's top border.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-top-style CSS属性设置元素的顶部的线条样式 border 。

trans-unit.source: The border-top-widthCSS property sets the width of the top border of a box.

trans-unit.source: The border-top-widthCSS property sets the width of the top border of an element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 border-top-width CSS属性设置元素的上边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The border-topCSS property is a shorthand that sets the values of border-top-width, border-top-style, and border-top-color. These properties describe an element's top border.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-top 的CSS属性是设置的值的速记 border-top-width ， border-top-style 和 border-top-color 。这些属性描述了元素的顶部 border 。

trans-unit.source: The border-topshorthandCSS property sets all the properties of an element's top border.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-top 速记CSS属性设置元素的顶部的所有属性的边界。

trans-unit.source: The border-width property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values.
trans-unit.target: 的 border-width 属性可以使用一个，两个，三个，或四个值来指定。

trans-unit.source: The border-widthshorthandCSS property sets the width of an element's border.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-width 速记CSS属性设置元素的边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The border-widthshorthandCSS property sets the widths of all four sides of an element's border.
trans-unit.target: 在 border-width 速记CSS属性设置元素的边框的四个侧面的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The border property may be specified using one, two, or three of the values listed below. The order of the values does not matter.
trans-unit.target: 的 border 属性可以使用一个，两个或三个以下列出的值来指定。值的顺序无关紧要。

trans-unit.source: The border shorthand is especially useful when you want all four borders to be the same. To make them different from each other, however, you can use the longhand border-width, border-style, and border-color properties, which accept different values for each side. Alternatively, you can target one border at a time with the physical (e.g., border-top ) and logical (e.g., border-block-start) border properties.
trans-unit.target: 当您希望所有四个边框都相同时， border 速记特别有用。但是，要使它们彼此不同，可以使用长期的 border-width ， border-style 和 border-color 属性，它们的每一面都接受不同的值。另外，您可以一次使用物理（例如 border-top ）边界和逻辑（例如 border-block-start ）边界属性来定位一个边界。

trans-unit.source: The borderCSS property sets an element's border. It's a shorthand for border-width, border-style, and border-color.
trans-unit.target: 在 border 的CSS属性设置元素的边框。这是一个速记的 border-width ， border-style ，和 border-color 。

trans-unit.source: The bordershorthandCSS property sets an element's border. It sets the values of border-width, border-style, and border-color.
trans-unit.target: 在 border 速记CSS属性设置元素的边框。它设置 border-width ， border-style 和 border-color 的值。

trans-unit.source: The bottomCSS property participates in setting the vertical position of a positioned element. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.
trans-unit.target: 的 bottom CSS属性参与了设定的垂直位置定位的元素。它对未定位的元素没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The bottomCSS property participates in specifying the vertical position of a positioned element. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.
trans-unit.target: 的 bottom CSS属性参与了指定的垂直位置定位的元素。它对未定位的元素没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The box-decoration-break property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 box-decoration-break 属性指定为下面列出的关键字值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The box-decoration-breakCSS property specifies how an element's fragments should be rendered when broken across multiple lines, columns, or pages.
trans-unit.target: 该 box-decoration-break CSS属性指定一个元素的片段时，多行，列或页面断应该呈现。

trans-unit.source: The box-shadow CSS property adds shadow effects around an element's frame. You can set multiple effects separated by commas. A box shadow is described by X and Y offsets relative to the element, blur and spread radii, and color.
trans-unit.target: 该 box-shadow CSS属性元素周围的边框加阴影效果。您可以设置多个效果，以逗号分隔。框阴影由相对于元素的X和Y偏移，模糊和散布半径以及颜色描述。

trans-unit.source: The box-shadow property enables you to cast a drop shadow from the frame of almost any element. If a border-radius is specified on the element with a box shadow, the box shadow takes on the same rounded corners. The z-ordering of multiple box shadows is the same as multiple text shadows (the first specified shadow is on top).
trans-unit.target: 该 box-shadow 属性可以从几乎任何元素的框架蒙上了阴影。如果在元素上使用边框阴影指定了 border-radius ，则边框阴影将具有相同的圆角。多个框阴影的z顺序与多个文本阴影相同（第一个指定的阴影在顶部）。

trans-unit.source: The box-shadowCSS property adds shadow effects around an element's frame. You can set multiple effects separated by commas. A box shadow is described by X and Y offsets relative to the element, blur and spread radius, and color.
trans-unit.target: 该 box-shadow CSS属性元素周围的边框加阴影效果。您可以设置多个效果，以逗号分隔。框阴影由相对于元素的X和Y偏移量，模糊和散布半径以及颜色来描述。

trans-unit.source: The box-sizing property can be used to adjust this behavior:

trans-unit.source: The box-sizingCSS property defines how the user agent should calculate the total width and height of an element.
trans-unit.target: 所述 box-sizing CSS属性定义如何用户代理应计算的元素的总宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: The box-sizingCSS property sets how the total width and height of an element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: 所述 box-sizing CSS属性集如何元素的总宽度和高度被计算。

trans-unit.source: The break-after property is specified as one of the keyword values from the list below.

trans-unit.source: The break-afterCSS property defines how page, column, or region breaks should behave after a generated box. If there is no generated box, the property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在 break-after CSS属性定义如何页，列或区域休息应生成框后的行为。如果没有生成的框，则忽略该属性。

trans-unit.source: The break-afterCSS property sets how page, column, or region breaks should behave after a generated box. If there is no generated box, the property is ignored.

trans-unit.target: 在 break-inside 的CSS属性定义如何页，列或区域断裂行为应该产生一个盒子里。如果没有生成的框，则忽略该属性。

trans-unit.source: The brightness()CSS function applies a linear multiplier to the input image, making it appear brighter or darker. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 brightness() CSS功能施加线性乘法器输入图像，使得它显得更亮或更暗。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The calc()CSS function lets you perform calculations when specifying CSS property values. It can be used anywhere a <length>, <frequency>, <angle>, <time>, <percentage>, <number>, or <integer> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 该 calc() CSS功能可让您指定CSS属性值时进行计算。可以在允许 <length> ， <frequency> ， <angle> ， <time> ， <percentage> ， <number> 或 <integer> 的任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: The calc()CSSfunction lets you perform calculations when specifying CSS property values. It can be used anywhere a <length>, <frequency>, <angle>, <time>, <percentage>, <number>, or <integer> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 该 calc() CSS功能可让您指定CSS属性值时进行计算。可以在允许 <length> ， <frequency> ， <angle> ， <time> ， <percentage> ， <number> 或 <integer> 的任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: The capitalize keyword was under-specified in CSS 1 and CSS 2.1. This resulted in differences between browsers in the way the first letter was calculated (Firefox considered - and _ as letters, but other browsers did not. Both Webkit and Gecko incorrectly considered letter-based symbols like ⓐ to be real letters. Internet Explorer 9 was the closest to the CSS 2 definition, but with some weird cases.) By precisely defining the correct behavior, CSS Text Level 3 cleans this mess up. The capitalize line in the browser compatibility table contains the version the different engines started to support this now precisely-defined behavior.
trans-unit.target: 将 capitalize 关键字在CSS 1和CSS 2.1下指定。这导致浏览器之间第一个字母的计算方式有所不同（Firefox将 - 和 _ 视为字母，但其他浏览器却没有。Webkit和Gecko都错误地将基于字母的符号（如 ⓐ )视为真实字母。InternetExplorer 9是（最接近CSS 2定义，但有一些奇怪的情况。）通过精确定义正确的行为，CSS Text Level 3消除了这种混乱。在 capitalize 浏览器兼容性表行包含版本开始支持这个现在精确定义的行为不同的引擎。

trans-unit.source: The caption-side property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 caption-side 属性指定为下面列出的关键字值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The caption-sideCSS property puts the content of a table's <caption> on the specified side. The values are relative to the writing-mode of the table.
trans-unit.target: 的 caption-side 的CSS属性，将一个表的内容的 <caption> 上的指定侧。这些值是相对于表的 writing-mode 的。

trans-unit.source: The caret-color CSS property sets the color of the insertion caret, the visible marker where the next character typed will be inserted. This is sometimes referred to as the text input cursor. The caret appears in elements such as <input> or those with the contenteditable attribute. The caret is typically a thin vertical line that flashes to help make it more noticeable. By default, it is black, but its color can be altered with this property.
trans-unit.target: 该 caret-color CSS属性设置的颜色插入符，可见标记下一个字符输入的字符将被插入。有时将其称为文本输入光标。插入符号出现在诸如 <input> 或具有 contenteditable 属性的元素中。插入符号通常是一条细的垂直线，该线会闪烁以帮助使其更加明显。默认情况下，它是黑色，但是可以使用此属性更改其颜色。

trans-unit.source: The caret-color CSS property sets the color of the insertion caret, the visible marker where the next character typed will be inserted. The caret appears in elements such as <input> or those with the contenteditable attribute. The caret is typically a thin vertical line that flashes to help make it more noticeable. By default, it is black, but its color can be altered with this property.
trans-unit.target: 该 caret-color CSS属性设置插入符的颜色，可见标记下一个字符输入的字符将被插入。插入符号出现在诸如 <input> 或具有 contenteditable 属性的元素中。插入符号通常是一条细的垂直线，该线会闪烁以帮助使其更加引人注目。默认情况下，它是黑色，但是可以使用此属性更改其颜色。

trans-unit.source: The circle() value for shape-outside can accept two possible arguments. The first is the shape-radius.
trans-unit.target: shape-outside 的 circle() 值可以接受两个可能的参数。第一个是 shape-radius 。
