trans-unit.target: 在 cjk-ideographic 是相同的 trad-chinese-informal ; 它存在是出于遗留原因。

trans-unit.source: The clamp() function takes three comma separated expressions as its parameter, in the order of minimum value, preferred value, maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 所述 clamp() 函数有三个逗号分隔的表达式作为其参数，在最小值时，优选的值，最大值的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The clamp()CSS function clamps a value between an upper and lower bound. clamp() enables selecting a middle value within a range of values between a definited minimum and maximum. It takes three parameters: a minimum value, a preferred value, and a maximum allowed value. The clamp() function can be used anywhere a <length>, <frequency>, <angle>, <time>, <percentage>, <number>, or <integer> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 clamp() CSS功能夹具的上界和下界之间的值。 clamp() 可以在确定的最大值和最小值之间的范围内选择一个中间值。它包含三个参数：最小值，首选值和最大允许值。所述 clamp() 函数可以在任何地方使用的 <length> ， <frequency> ， <angle> ， <time> ， <percentage> ， <number> 或 <integer> 是允许的。

trans-unit.source: The clamp()CSSfunction clamps a value between an upper and lower bound. clamp() enables selecting a middle value within a range of values between a defined minimum and maximum. It takes three parameters: a minimum value, a preferred value, and a maximum allowed value. The clamp() function can be used anywhere a <length>, <frequency>, <angle>, <time>, <percentage>, <number>, or <integer> is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 clamp() CSS功能夹具的上界和下界之间的值。 clamp() 可以在定义的最小值和最大值之间的值范围内选择一个中间值。它包含三个参数：最小值，首选值和最大允许值。所述 clamp() 函数可以在任何地方使用的 <length> ， <frequency> ， <angle> ， <time> ， <percentage> ， <number> 或 <integer> 是允许的。

trans-unit.source: The clearCSS property sets whether an element must be moved below (cleared) floating elements that precede it. The clear property applies to floating and non-floating elements.
trans-unit.target: 该 clear 的CSS属性设置是否元素必须低于（清零）被移动浮动它前面的元件。在 clear 属性适用于浮动和非浮动元素。

trans-unit.source: The clearCSS property sets whether an element must be moved below (cleared) floating elements that precede it. The clear property applies to floating and non-floating elements.
trans-unit.target: 该 clear 的CSS属性设置是否元素必须低于（清零）被移动浮动它前面的元件。在 clear 属性适用于浮动和非浮动元素。

trans-unit.source: The clip-path property is specified as one or a combination of the values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 将 clip-path 属性指定为下面列出的值之一或组合。

trans-unit.source: The clipCSS property defines a visible portion of an element. The clip property applies only to absolutely positioned elements — that is, elements with position:absolute or position:fixed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 clip CSS属性定义的元件的可见部分。的 clip 属性仅适用于绝对定位的元素-即，具有元素 position:absolute 或 position:fixed 。

trans-unit.source: The clipCSS property defines what portion of an element is visible. The clip property applies only to absolutely positioned elements, that is elements with position:absolute or position:fixed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 clip CSS属性定义的元素的哪一部分是可见的。的 clip 属性仅适用于绝对定位的元素，即与元件 position:absolute 或 position:fixed 。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjust CSS property sets what, if anything, the user agent may do to optimize the appearance of the element on the output device. By default, the browser is allowed to make any adjustments to the element's appearance it determines to be necessary and prudent given the type and capabilities of the output device.
trans-unit.target: 该 color-adjust CSS属性集，如果有的话，则用户代理可以做优化元件的输出设备上的外观。默认情况下，允许浏览器对它认为必要和谨慎的元素外观进行任何调整（考虑到输出设备的类型和功能）。

trans-unit.source: The color-adjust property's value must be one of the following keywords.
trans-unit.target: 该 color-adjust 属性的值必须是以下关键字之一。

trans-unit.source: The color-gamut feature is specified as a keyword value chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 的 color-gamut 特征被指定为从下面的列表中选择的关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The color-gamutCSSmedia feature can be used to test the approximate range of colors that are supported by the user agent and the output device.
trans-unit.target: 的 color-gamut CSS 媒体功能可用于测试由所支持的颜色的近似范围内的用户代理和输出设备。

trans-unit.source: The color-index feature is specified as an <integer> value representing the number of entries in the output device's color lookup table. (This value is zero if the device does not use such a table.) It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-color-index and max-color-index variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 所述 color-index 特征被指定为 <integer> 表示的条目在输出装置的颜色查找表的数值。 （如果设备不使用此表，则该值为零。）这是范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用前缀的 min-color-index 和 max-color-index 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。 。

trans-unit.source: The color-indexCSSmedia feature can be used to test the number of entries in the output device's color lookup table.
trans-unit.target: 所述 color-index CSS 媒体功能可用于测试的条目在输出装置的颜色查找表的数目。

trans-unit.source: The color CSS property sets the foreground color value of an element's text and text decorations, and sets the currentcolor value. currentcolor may be used as an indirect value on other properties and is the default for other color properties, such as border-color.
trans-unit.target: 该 color 的CSS属性设置前景色的颜色值元素的文本和文本修饰，并设置 currentcolor 值。 currentcolor 可用作其他属性的间接值，并且是其他颜色属性（例如 border-color ）的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The color feature is specified as an <integer> value that represents the number of bits per color component (red, green, blue) of the output device. If the device is not a color device, the value is zero. It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-color and max-color variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 的 color 特征被指定为 <integer> 表示每个颜色分量的比特数的值的输出设备（红，绿，蓝）。如果该设备不是彩色设备，则该值为零。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用前缀的 min-color 和 max-color 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The color property is specified as a single <color> value.
trans-unit.target: 将 color 属性指定为单个 <color> 值。

trans-unit.source: The colorCSSmedia feature can be used to test the number of bits per color component (red, green, blue) of the output device.
trans-unit.target: 的 color CSS 媒体功能可用于测试每个颜色分量的比特数输出装置（红，绿，蓝）。

trans-unit.target: 该 column-count 属性设置列的一个特定的数目。例如，

trans-unit.source: The column-gapCSS property sets the size of the gap (gutter) between an element's columns.

trans-unit.source: The column-rule-color property is specified as a single <color> value.

trans-unit.source: The column-rule-style property is specified as a single <'border-style'> value.

trans-unit.source: The column-rule-styleCSS property sets the style of the line drawn between columns in a multi-column layout.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-rule-style CSS属性设置在一个多列布局列之间绘制的线条的风格。

trans-unit.source: The column-rule-width property is specified as a single <'border-width'> value.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-rule-width 属性被指定为单个 <'border-width'> 值。

trans-unit.source: The column-rule-widthCSS property sets the width of the line drawn between columns in a multi-column layout.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-rule-width CSS属性设置在多列布局列之间绘制的线的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The column-rule-widthCSS property sets the width of the rule (line) drawn between columns in a multi-column layout.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-rule-width CSS属性设置在多列布局列之间绘出的规则（线）的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The column-rule property is specified as one, two, or three of the values listed below, in any order.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-rule 属性指定为一个，两个，或三个以下列出的值，以任何顺序。

trans-unit.source: The column-ruleCSS property sets the width, style, and color of the rule (line) drawn between columns in a multi-column layout.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-rule CSS属性设置宽度，样式，及在多列布局列之间绘出的规则（线）的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The column-ruleshorthandCSS property sets the width, style, and color of the line drawn between columns in a multi-column layout.
trans-unit.target: 该 column-rule 速记CSS属性设置宽度，样式和在多列布局列之间绘制的线条的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The column-span property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 column-span 属性指定为下面列出的关键字值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The column-spanCSS property makes it possible for an element to span across all columns when its value is set to all.
trans-unit.target: 使用 column-span CSS属性，可以将元素的值设置为 all 时，使其跨越所有列。

trans-unit.source: The column-width property
trans-unit.target: 的 column-width 属性

trans-unit.source: The column-width property is specified as one of the values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 column-width 属性指定为下列值之一。

trans-unit.source: The column-width property is used to set the optimal width for every column box. If you declare a column-width, the browser will work out how many columns of that width will fit into the multicol container and distribute any extra space equally between the columns. Therefore, the column width should be seen as a minimum width, as column boxes are likely to be wider due to the additional space.
trans-unit.target: 的 column-width 属性用于设定每列盒的最佳宽度。如果声明一列宽，浏览器将计算出该宽度中有多少列适合multicol容器，并在各列之间平均分配额外的空间。因此，列宽应视为最小宽度，因为由于额外的空间，列框可能会更宽。

trans-unit.source: The column-width property sets the minimum desired column width. If column-count is not also set, then the browser will automatically make as many columns as fit in the available width.
trans-unit.target: 的 column-width 属性设置最小期望列宽。如果未同时设置 column-count ，则浏览器将自动在可用宽度内创建尽可能多的列。

trans-unit.source: The column-widthCSS property sets the ideal column width in a multi-column layout. The container will have as many columns as can fit without any of them having a width less than the column-width value. If the width of the container is narrower than the specified value, the single column's width will be smaller than the declared column width.
trans-unit.target: 的 column-width 的CSS属性设置在多列布局的理想列的宽度。容器将具有尽可能多的适合的列，但它们的宽度都小于 column-width 值。如果容器的宽度小于指定的值，则单列的宽度将小于声明的列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The column-widthCSS property specifies the ideal column width in a multi-column layout. The container will have as many columns as can fit without any of them having a width less than the column-width value. If the width of the container is narrower than the specified value, the single column's width will be smaller than the declared column width.
trans-unit.target: 的 column-width 的CSS属性指定在多列布局的理想列的宽度。容器将具有尽可能多的列，而其宽度都不小于 column-width 值。如果容器的宽度小于指定的值，则单列的宽度将小于声明的列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The columns property may be specified as one or two of the values listed below, in any order.
trans-unit.target: 可以按任意顺序将 columns 属性指定为下面列出的一个或两个值。

trans-unit.source: The columns shorthand
trans-unit.target: 该 columns 速记

trans-unit.source: The columnsCSS property sets the column width and column count of an element.
trans-unit.target: 的 columns CSS属性设置元素的列宽和列计数。

trans-unit.source: The columnsCSS shorthand property sets the number of columns to use when drawing an element's contents, as well as those columns' widths.
trans-unit.target: 该 columns CSS缩写属性集绘画元素的内容时，以及那些列的宽度使用的列数。

trans-unit.source: The conic-gradient()CSS function creates an image consisting of a gradient with color transitions rotated around a center point (rather than radiating from the center). Example conic gradients include pie charts and color wheels, but they can also be used for creating checker boards and other intersting effects.
trans-unit.target: 所述 conic-gradient() CSS函数创建一个图像由梯度的颜色转变旋转围绕中心点（而不是从中心辐射）。圆锥曲线示例包括饼图和色轮，但它们也可用于创建棋盘格和其他有趣的效果。

trans-unit.source: The conic-gradient()CSSfunction creates an image consisting of a gradient with color transitions rotated around a center point (rather than radiating from the center). Example conic gradients include pie charts and color wheels. The result of the conic-gradient() function is an object of the <gradient> data type, which is a special kind of <image>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 conic-gradient() CSS功能创建图像组成的梯度的颜色转变旋转围绕中心点（而不是从中心辐射）。圆锥曲线示例包括饼图和色轮。所述的结果 conic-gradient() 函数是的目的 <gradient> 数据类型，它是一种特殊的 <image> 。

trans-unit.source: The contain CSS property allows an author to indicate that an element and its contents are, as much as possible, independent of the rest of the document tree. This allows the browser to recalculate layout, style, paint, size, or any combination of them for a limited area of the DOM and not the entire page.
trans-unit.target: 在 contain CSS属性允许作者指示元素并对其内容的，尽可能的，独立的文档树的其余部分。这允许浏览器针对DOM的有限区域而不是整个页面重新计算布局，样式，绘画，大小或它们的任意组合。

trans-unit.source: The contain property is specified as either one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 将 contain 属性指定为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The contain value specifies that, regardless of the size of the containing box, the background image should be scaled so that each side is as large as possible while not exceeding the length of the corresponding side of the container. Try resizing the example below to see this in action.
trans-unit.target: 所述 contain 值指定，无论容纳箱的尺寸，背景图像应当缩放，使得每一侧上是尽可能大，同时不超过所述容器的对应的边的长度。尝试调整以下示例的大小，以查看实际效果。

trans-unit.source: The containCSS property allows an author to indicate that an element and its contents are, as much as possible, independent of the rest of the document tree. This allows the browser to recalculate layout, style, paint, size, or any combination of them for a limited area of the DOM and not the entire page, leading to obvious performance benefits.
trans-unit.target: 在 contain CSS属性允许作者指示元素并对其内容的，尽可能的，独立的文档树的其余部分。这允许浏览器针对DOM的有限区域而不是整个页面重新计算布局，样式，绘画，大小或它们的任意组合，从而带来明显的性能优势。

trans-unit.source: The content-box value defines the shape enclosed by the outside content edge. Each corner radius of this box is the larger of 0 or border-radius − border-width − padding. This Means that it is impossible to have a negative value here.
trans-unit.target: 所述 content-box 值定义了外部内容边缘所包围的形状。此框的每个角半径均是0或border-radius-border-width-padding中的较大者。这意味着此处不可能有负值。

trans-unit.source: The content-visibilityCSS property controls whether or not an element renders its contents at all, along with forcing a strong set of containments, allowing user agents to potentially omit large swathes of layout and rendering work until it becomes needed. Basically it enables the user agent to skip an element's rendering work, including layout and painting, until it is needed, makes the initial page load much faster.
trans-unit.target: 该 content-visibility CSS属性控制的元素是否在所有呈现的内容，以迫使一套强有力的安全壳，允许用户代理的布局可能省略大片，直到它变成需要渲染的工作进展。基本上，它使用户代理可以跳过元素的渲染工作，包括布局和绘画，直到需要时才使初始页面加载更快。

trans-unit.source: The content value is shorthand for contain: layout paint. It tells the browser that the internal layout of the element is totally separate from the rest of the page, and that everything about the element is painted inside its bounds. Nothing can visibly overflow.
trans-unit.target: 该 content 值是简写形式， contain: layout paint 。它告诉浏览器，该元素的内部布局与页面的其余部分完全分开，并且有关该元素的所有内容都绘制在其边界内。没有任何东西可以明显溢出。

trans-unit.source: The contentCSS property replaces an element with a generated value. Objects inserted using the content property are anonymous replaced elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 content CSS属性替换与所生成的值的元素。使用 content 属性插入的对象是匿名替换的元素。

trans-unit.source: The contentCSS property replaces an element with a generated value. Objects inserted using the content property are anonymous replaced elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 content CSS属性替换与所生成的值的元素。使用 content 属性插入的对象是匿名替换的元素。

trans-unit.source: The contents value of the display property is a new value that is described in the spec as follows:
trans-unit.target: display 属性的 contents 值是一个新值，在规范中描述如下：

trans-unit.source: The contrast()CSSfunction adjusts the contrast of the input image. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 contrast() CSS功能调整输入图像的对比度。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The counter() function has two forms: 'counter(name)' or 'counter(name, style)'. The generated text is the value of the innermost counter of the given name in scope at the given pseudo-element. It is formatted in the specified style (decimal by default).
trans-unit.target: 该 counter() 函数有两种形式：“计数器（ name ）”或“计数器（ name ， style ）”。生成的文本是在给定伪元素范围内给定名称的最里面计数器的值。它以指定的样式设置格式（默认为 decimal ）。

trans-unit.source: The counter()CSSfunction returns a string representing the current value of the named counter, if there is one. It is generally used with pseudo-elements, but can be used, theoretically, anywhere a <string> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 该 counter() CSS函数返回一个代表命名计数器的当前值的字符串，如果有一个。它通常与伪元素一起使用，但理论上可以在支持 <string> 值的任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: The counter-increment property is specified as either one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 将 counter-increment 属性指定为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The counter-incrementCSS property increases or decreases the value of a CSS counter by a given value.
trans-unit.target: 该 counter-increment CSS属性增加或减少一个值CSS计数器由给定值。

trans-unit.source: The counter-reset property is specified as either one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 将 counter-reset 属性指定为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The counter-resetCSS property resets a CSS counter to a given value.
trans-unit.target: 该 counter-reset CSS属性重置一个CSS计数器给定值。

trans-unit.source: The counter-set property is specified as either one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 该 counter-set 属性被指定为以下中的任一个：

trans-unit.source: The counter-setCSS property sets a CSS counter to a given value. It manipulates the value of existing counters, and will only create new counters if there isn't already a counter of the given name on the element.
trans-unit.target: 该 counter-set CSS属性设置一个CSS计数器给定值。它操纵现有计数器的值，并且仅在元素上没有给定名称的计数器时才创建新的计数器。

trans-unit.source: The counters() function also has two forms: 'counters(name, string)' or 'counters(name, string, style)'. The generated text is the value of all counters with the given name in scope at the given pseudo-element, from outermost to innermost, separated by the specified string. The counters are rendered in the indicated style (decimal by default).
trans-unit.target: 该 counters() 函数也有两种形式：“计数器（ name ， string ）”或“计数器（ name ， string ， style ）”。生成的文本是范围内给定伪元素中具有给定名称的所有计数器的值，从最外到最内，由指定字符串分隔。计数器以指示的样式呈现（默认为 decimal ）。

trans-unit.source: The counters()CSSfunction enables nested counters, returning a concatenated string representing the current values of the named counters, if there are any. The counters() function has two forms: counters(name, string) or counters(name, string, style). It is generally used with pseudo-elements, but can be used, theoretically, anywhere a <string> value is supported. The generated text is the value of all counters with the given name, from outermost to innermost, separated by the specified string. The counters are rendered in the style indicated, defaulting to decimal if no style is specified.
trans-unit.target: 所述 counters() CSS功能能嵌套计数器，返回表示指定的计数器的当前值的串联的字符串，如果有任何。该 counters() 函数有两种形式： counters(name, string) 或 counters(name, string, style) 。它通常与伪元素一起使用，但理论上可以在 <string> 的任何地方使用支持值。生成的文本是具有给定名称的所有计数器的值，从最外到最内，由指定字符串分隔。计数器以指示的样式呈现，如果未指定样式，则默认为 decimal 。

trans-unit.source: The cover value specifies that the background image should be sized so that it is as small as possible while ensuring that both dimensions are greater than or equal to the corresponding size of the container. Try resizing the example below to see this in action.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cover 值指定背景图像的尺寸应使得它尽可能小，同时确保两个尺寸大于或等于所述容器的相应的尺寸。尝试调整以下示例的大小，以查看实际效果。

trans-unit.source: The cross-fade() function takes a list of images with a percentage defining how much of each image is retained in terms of opacity when it is blended with the other images. The percent value must be coded without quotes, must contain the “%” symbol, and its value must be between 0% and 100%.
trans-unit.target: 该 cross-fade() 函数将图像的列表以百分比限定多少各图像的被保持在不透明度方面当它与其它图像混合。百分比值必须编码为不带引号，并且必须包含“％”符号，并且其值必须在0％和100％之间。

trans-unit.source: The cross-fade()CSSfunction can be used to blend two or more images at a defined transparency. It can be used for many simple image manipulations, such as tinting an image with a solid color or highlighting a particular area of the page by combining an image with a radial gradient.
trans-unit.target: 该 cross-fade() CSS功能，可以使用在规定的透明性共混两个或更多图像。它可用于许多简单的图像操作，例如用纯色为图像着色或通过将图像与径向渐变组合来突出显示页面的特定区域。

trans-unit.source: The cubic-bezier() class of easing functions
trans-unit.target: 缓动函数的 cubic-bezier() 类

trans-unit.source: The cubic-bezier() functional notation defines a cubic Bézier curve. As these curves are continuous, they are often used to smooth down the start and end of the animation and are therefore sometimes called easing functions.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cubic-bezier() 函数表示法限定了三次Bezier曲线。由于这些曲线是连续的，因此通常用于平滑动画的开始和结束，因此有时被称为缓动函数。

trans-unit.source: The currentColor keyword represents the value of an element's color property. This lets you use the color value on properties that do not receive it by default.
trans-unit.target: 该 currentColor 关键字代表元素的值 color 属性。这使您可以在默认情况下不接收 color 属性上使用颜色值。

trans-unit.source: The currentcolor keyword represents the value of an element's color property. This lets you use the color value on properties that do not receive it by default.
trans-unit.target: 该 currentcolor 关键字代表元素的值 color 属性。这使您可以在默认情况下不接收 color 属性上使用颜色值。

trans-unit.source: The cursor property is specified as zero or more <url> values, separated by commas, followed by a single mandatory keyword value. Each <url> should point to an image file. The browser will try to load the first image specified, falling back to the next if it can't, and falling back to the keyword value if no images could be loaded (or if none were specified).
trans-unit.target: 的 cursor 属性被指定为零个或多个 <url> 值，用逗号分隔，随后通过单个强制性关键字值。每个 <url> 应指向一个图像文件。浏览器将尝试加载指定的第一个图像，如果无法加载，则退回到下一个图像，如果无法加载（或未指定任何图像），则退回到关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The cursorCSS property sets the type of mouse cursor, if any, to show when the mouse pointer is over an element.
trans-unit.target: 的 cursor 的CSS属性设置鼠标光标的类型，如果有的话，以显示当鼠标指针在一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The cursorCSS property specifies sets mouse cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over an element.
trans-unit.target: 的 cursor CSS显示属性指定组鼠标光标当鼠标指针在一个元素。

trans-unit.source: The device-aspect-ratio feature is specified as a <ratio>. It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-device-aspect-ratio and max-device-aspect-ratio variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 该 device-aspect-ratio 特征被指定为 <ratio> 。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用带前缀的 min-device-aspect-ratio 和 max-device-aspect-ratio 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The device-aspect-ratioCSSmedia feature can be used to test the width-to-height aspect ratio of an output device.
trans-unit.target: 该 device-aspect-ratio CSS 媒体功能可被用来测试一个输出装置的宽度与高度的纵横比。

trans-unit.source: The device-height feature is specified as a <length> value. It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-device-height and max-device-height variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 该 device-height 特性被指定为 <length> 值。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用前缀的 min-device-height 和 max-device-height 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The device-heightCSSmedia feature can be used to test the height of an output device's rendering surface.
trans-unit.target: 该 device-height CSS 媒体功能可被用来测试一个输出设备的渲染表面的高度。

trans-unit.source: The device-width feature is specified as a <length> value. It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-device-width and max-device-width variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 所述 device-width 的特征被指定为 <length> 值。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用前缀的 min-device-width 和 max-device-width 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The device-widthCSSmedia feature can be used to test the width of an output device's rendering surface.
trans-unit.target: 所述 device-width CSS 媒体功能可被用来测试一个输出设备的渲染表面的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The direction CSS property sets the direction of text, table columns, and horizontal overflow. Use rtl for languages written from right to left (like Hebrew or Arabic), and ltr for those written from left to right (like English and most other languages).
trans-unit.target: 该 direction CSS属性设置文本，表格列和水平溢出的方向。使用 rtl （如希伯来语或阿拉伯语），并书面从右到左的语言 ltr 对于那些书面从左到右（如英语和大多数其他语言）。

trans-unit.source: The direction and unicode-bidi properties are the two only properties which are not affected by the all shorthand property.
trans-unit.target: 该 direction 和 unicode-bidi 特性是未受到这两个属性只有 all 速记属性。

trans-unit.source: The display-mode feature is specified as a keyword value chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 的 display-mode 的功能被指定为从下面的列表中选择的关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The display-modeCSSmedia feature can be used to test the display mode of an application. You can use it to provide a consistent user experience between launching a site from a URL and launching it from a desktop icon.
trans-unit.target: 所述 display-mode CSS 媒体功能可用于测试应用程序的显示模式。您可以使用它在从URL启动网站和从桌面图标启动网站之间提供一致的用户体验。

trans-unit.source: The display property and flow layout
trans-unit.target: 的 display 属性和流布局

trans-unit.source: The display property is specified using keyword values. Keyword values are grouped into six value categories:
trans-unit.target: 所述 display 属性是使用关键字值指定。关键字值分为六个值类别：

trans-unit.source: The displayCSS property defines the
trans-unit.target: 所述 display CSS属性定义

trans-unit.source: The displayCSS property sets whether an element is treated as a block or inline element and the layout used for its children, such as flow layout, grid or flex.
trans-unit.target: 所述 display CSS属性集的元素是否被作为一个处理的块或内联元件和用于其的儿童，如布局流布局，网格或挠曲。

trans-unit.source: The drop-shadow() function accepts a parameter of type <shadow> (defined in the box-shadow property), with the exception that the inset keyword and spread parameters are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 drop-shadow() 函数接受类型的参数 <shadow> （在定义的 box-shadow 属性），不同之处在于所述 inset 关键字和 spread 参数是不允许的。

trans-unit.source: The drop-shadow() function accepts a parameter of type <shadow> (defined in the box-shadow property), with the exception that the inset keyword is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 drop-shadow() 函数接受类型的参数 <shadow> （在定义的 box-shadow 属性），不同之处在于所述 inset 关键字是不允许的。

trans-unit.source: The drop-shadow()CSS function applies a drop shadow effect to the input image. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 drop-shadow() CSS功能施加阴影效果的输入图像。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The drop-shadow()CSSfunction applies a drop shadow effect to the input image. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 drop-shadow() CSS功能施加阴影效果的输入图像。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The element()CSS function defines an <image> value generated from an arbitrary HTML element. This image is live, meaning that if the HTML element is changed, the CSS properties using the resulting value are automatically updated.
trans-unit.target: 所述 element() CSS功能定义 <image> 从任意HTML元件产生的值。此图像是实时的，这意味着如果更改了HTML元素，则会自动更新使用结果值的CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: The element()CSSfunction defines an <image> value generated from an arbitrary HTML element. This image is live, meaning that if the HTML element is changed, the CSS properties using the resulting value are automatically updated.
trans-unit.target: 所述 element() CSS功能定义 <image> 从任意HTML元件产生的值。该图像是实时的，这意味着如果更改了HTML元素，则会自动更新使用结果值的CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: The empty-cells CSS property sets whether borders and backgrounds appear around <table> cells that have no visible content.
trans-unit.target: 该 empty-cells CSS属性设置是否边框和背景周围出现 <table> 有没有明显的内容的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The empty-cells property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 将 empty-cells 属性指定为下面列出的关键字值之一。

trans-unit.source: The env()CSSfunction can be used to insert the value of a user agent-defined environment variable into your CSS, in a similar fashion to the var function and custom properties. The difference is that, as well as being user-agent defined rather than user-defined, environment variables are globally scoped to a document, whereas custom properties are scoped to the element(s) on which they are declared.
trans-unit.target: 在 env() CSS功能可用于用户代理定义的环境变量的值插入到CSS，以类似的方式对 var 函数和自定义属性。区别在于，环境变量除了由用户定义而不是由用户定义外，还全局地限制在文档中，而自定义属性的范围则在声明它们的元素上。

trans-unit.source: The fallback descriptor can be used to specify a counter style to fall back to if the current counter style cannot create a marker representation for a particular counter value.
trans-unit.target: 该 fallback 描述符可以用来指定计数器样式回落到如果当前计数器风格不能为特定的计数器值创建一个标记表示。

trans-unit.source: The fallback descriptor can be used to specify a counter style to fall back to if the current counter style cannot create a marker representation for a particular counter value. If the specified fallback style is also unable to construct a representation, then its fallback style will be used. If a valid fallback style is not specified, it defaults to decimal.
trans-unit.target: 该 fallback 描述符可以用来指定计数器样式回落到如果当前计数器风格不能为特定的计数器值创建一个标记表示。如果指定的后备样式也无法构造表示形式，则将使用其后备样式。如果未指定有效的后备样式，则默认为 decimal 。

trans-unit.source: The filter property is specified as none or one or more of the functions listed below. If the parameter for any function is invalid, the function returns none. Except where noted, the functions that take a value expressed with a percent sign (as in 34%) also accept the value expressed as decimal (as in 0.34).
trans-unit.target: 将 filter 属性指定为以下所列功能之一或 none 指定。如果任何函数的参数无效，则该函数将返回 none 。除非另有说明，否则采用以百分号表示的值的函数（如 34% ）也接受以十进制表示的值（如 0.34 ）。

trans-unit.source: The filterCSS property applies graphical effects like blur or color shift to an element. Filters are commonly used to adjust the rendering of images, backgrounds, and borders.
trans-unit.target: 所述 filter 的CSS属性应用于像模糊或色移的元素的图形效果。滤镜通常用于调整图像，背景和边框的渲染。

trans-unit.source: The fit-content()CSS function clamps a given size to an available size according to the formula min(maximum size, max(minimum size, argument)).
trans-unit.target: 的 fit-content() CSS功能根据下式夹具给定尺寸到可用大小 min(maximum size, max(minimum size, argument)) 。

trans-unit.source: The fit-content behaves as fit-content(stretch). In practice this means that the box will use the available space, but never more than max-content.
trans-unit.target: 所述 fit-content 表现为 fit-content(stretch) 。实际上，这意味着盒子将使用可用空间，但绝不会超过 max-content 。

trans-unit.source: The fit-content value can be used to set the width of an element based on the intrinsic size required by its content:
trans-unit.target: 所述 fit-content 值可以用于设置基于由它的内容所需的固有尺寸的元素的宽度：

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis is what defines the size of that item in terms of the space it leaves as available space. The initial value of this property is auto — in this case the browser looks to see if the items have a size. In the example above, all of the items have a width of 100 pixels and so this is used as the flex-basis.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis 是什么定义在它的叶子可用空间的空间方面该项目的大小。此属性的初始值为 auto -在这种情况下，浏览器将查看项目是否具有尺寸。在上面的示例中，所有项目的宽度均为100像素，因此将其用作 flex-basis 。

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis property
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis 属性

trans-unit.source: The flex-basis property is specified as either the keyword content or a <'width'>.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-basis 属性被指定为关键字 content 或一个 <'width'> 。

trans-unit.source: The flex-basisCSS property sets the initial main size of a flex item. It sets the size of the content box unless otherwise set with box-sizing.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-basis CSS属性设置柔性项目的初始主尺寸。除非使用 box-sizing 设置，否则它将设置内容框的大小。

trans-unit.source: The flex-directionCSS property sets how flex items are placed in the flex container defining the main axis and the direction (normal or reversed).
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-direction CSS属性集如何柔性物品被放置在所述柔性容器限定主轴线和方向（正常或反向）。

trans-unit.source: The flex-flowCSS property is a shorthand property for flex-direction and flex-wrap properties.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-flow CSS属性是一个速记财产 flex-direction 和 flex-wrap 的性质。

trans-unit.source: The flex-flowCSSshorthand property specifies the direction of a flex container, as well as its wrapping behavior.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-flow CSS速记属性指定了柔性容器的方向，以及其包装的行为。

trans-unit.source: The flex-grow property
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-grow 属性

trans-unit.source: The flex-grow property is specified as a single <number>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 flex-grow 属性指定为单个 <number> 。

trans-unit.source: The flex-growCSS property sets how much of the available space in the flex container should be assigned to that item (the flex grow factor). If all sibling items have the same flex grow factor, then all items will receive the same share of available space, otherwise it is distributed according to the ratio defined by the different flex grow factors.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-grow CSS属性集的多少在柔性容器中的可用空间应该被分配到该项目（柔性成长因子）。如果所有兄弟项目具有相同的弹性增长因子，则所有项目将获得相同的可用空间份额，否则，将根据不同的弹性增长因子所定义的比率进行分配。

trans-unit.source: The flex-growCSS property sets the flex grow factor of a flex item main size.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-grow CSS属性设置柔性物品的柔性增长的因素主要尺寸。

trans-unit.source: The flex-shrink property
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-shrink 特性

trans-unit.source: The flex-shrink property is specified as a single <number>.
trans-unit.target: 所述 flex-shrink 属性被指定为单个 <number> 。

trans-unit.source: The flex-shrinkCSS property sets the flex shrink factor of a flex item. If the size of flex items is larger than the flex container, items shrink to fit according to flex-shrink.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-shrink CSS属性设置柔性物品的柔性收缩因素。如果flex项目的大小大于flex容器，则项目会根据 flex-shrink 收缩以适合。

trans-unit.source: The flex-shrinkCSS property sets the flex shrink factor of a flex item. If the size of all flex items is larger than the flex container, items shrink to fit according to flex-shrink.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex-shrink CSS属性设置柔性物品的柔性收缩因素。如果所有flex项目的大小都大于flex容器，则项目会根据 flex-shrink 收缩以适合其大小。

trans-unit.source: The flex-wrap property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 的 flex-wrap 属性指定为从下面的值的列表中选择一个关键字。

trans-unit.source: The flex-wrapCSS property sets whether flex items are forced onto one line or can wrap onto multiple lines. If wrapping is allowed, it sets the direction that lines are stacked.
trans-unit.target: 在 flex-wrap CSS属性设置柔性物品是否被强制到一个线或可以换到多行。如果允许换行，它将设置线条堆叠的方向。

trans-unit.source: The flex property may be specified using one, two, or three values.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex 性可使用一个，两个或三个值来指定。

trans-unit.source: The flexCSS property sets how a flex item will grow or shrink to fit the space available in its flex container. It is a shorthand for flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex CSS属性设置柔性的项目将如何增长或缩小以适合可用空间在其弯曲的容器。这是一个简写为 flex-grow ， flex-shrink ，和 flex-basis 。

trans-unit.source: The flexCSSshorthand property sets how a flex item will grow or shrink to fit the space available in its flex container.
trans-unit.target: 该 flex CSS缩写属性设置柔性怎么项目将增长或缩小以适合可用空间在其弯曲的容器。

trans-unit.source: The float CSS property places an element on the left or right side of its container, allowing text and inline elements to wrap around it. The element is removed from the normal flow of the page, though still remaining a part of the flow (in contrast to absolute positioning).
trans-unit.target: 该 float CSS属性在其容器的左侧或右侧放置的元素，使文本和内联元素环绕它。尽管仍保留了部分流程（与绝对定位相反），但该元素已从页面的常规流程中移除。

trans-unit.source: The float property is specified as a single keyword, chosen from the list of values below.
trans-unit.target: 所述 float 属性被规定为单个关键字，从下面的值的列表中选择。

trans-unit.source: The flow-root value makes sense if you think about block and inline layout, which is sometimes called normal flow. Our HTML page creates a new formatting context (floats and margins cannot extend out from the boundaries) and our content lays out in normal flow, using block and inline layout, unless we change the value of display to use some other formatting context. Creating a grid or flex container also creates a new formatting context (a grid or flex formatting context, respectively.) These also contain everything inside them. However, if you want to contain floats and margins but continue using block and inline layout, you can create a new flow root, and start over with block and inline layout. From that point downwards everything is contained inside the new flow root.
trans-unit.target: 该 flow-root 值有道理的，如果你仔细想想block和inline布局，这有时被称为正常流动。我们的HTML页面创建了一个新的格式设置上下文（浮动和边距不能从边界延伸），我们的内容使用块和行内布局以常规流程进行布局，除非我们更改 display 的值使用其他格式的上下文。创建网格或flex容器还会创建一个新的格式设置上下文（分别为网格或flex格式设置上下文。）它们还包含其中的所有内容。但是，如果要包含浮点数和边距，但继续使用块和行内布局，则可以创建新的流根，然后从块和行内布局开始。从那时起，一切都包含在新流根内部。

trans-unit.source: The font-display descriptor determines how a font face is displayed based on whether and when it is downloaded and ready to use.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-display 的描述符确定字型如何根据是否显示，当它被下载并准备使用。

trans-unit.source: The font-family CSS descriptor allows authors to specify the font family for the font specified in an @font-face rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-family CSS描述符允许作者指定的字体家族在指定的字体 @font-face 的规则。

trans-unit.source: The font-family CSS property specifies a prioritized list of one or more font family names and/or generic family names for the selected element.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-family CSS属性指定的一个或多个字体系列名称和/或通用姓所选元素的优先级列表。

trans-unit.source: The font-family property lists one or more font families, separated by commas. Each font family is specified as either a <family-name> or a <generic-name> value.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-family 属性列表一个或多个字体的家庭，用逗号分隔。每个字体系列都被指定为 <family-name> 或 <generic-name> 值。

trans-unit.source: The font-family property specifies a list of fonts, from highest priority to lowest. Font selection does not simply stop at the first font in the list that is on the user's system. Rather, font selection is done one character at a time, so that if an available font does not have a glyph for a needed character, the latter fonts are tried. (However, this doesn't work in Internet Explorer 6 or earlier.) When a font is only available in some styles, variants, or sizes, those properties may also influence which font family is chosen.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-family 属性指定字体的列表，从最高优先级到最低。字体选择不只是停留在用户系统列表中的第一个字体上。而是一次选择一个字符来进行字体选择，因此，如果可用字体没有所需字符的字形，则尝试使用后一种字体。（但是，这在Internet Explorer 6或更早的版本中不起作用。）当字体仅以某些样式，变体或大小提供时，这些属性也可能会影响选择哪种字体系列。

trans-unit.source: The font-feature-settings CSS property controls advanced typographic features in OpenType fonts.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-feature-settings CSS属性控制在OpenType字体先进的排版功能。

trans-unit.source: The font-kerning CSS property sets the use of the kerning information stored in a font.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-kerning CSS属性设置使用存储在字体字距信息。

trans-unit.source: The font-kerning property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-kerning 属性被指定为下面列出的关键字值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The font-language-override CSS property controls the use of language-specific glyphs in a typeface.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-language-override CSS属性控制在字体使用特定语言的字形。

trans-unit.source: The font-language-override property is specified as the keyword normal or a <string>.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-language-override 属性被指定为关键字 normal 或 <string> 。

trans-unit.source: The font-language-override property lets you override the typeface behavior for a specific language. This is useful, for example, when the typeface you're using lacks proper support for the language. For instance, if a typeface doesn't have proper rules for the Azeri language, you can force the font to use Turkish glyphs, which follow similar rules.
trans-unit.target: 通过 font-language-override 属性，您可以覆盖特定语言的字体行为。例如，当您使用的字体缺少对该语言的适当支持时，这很有用。例如，如果字体没有用于Azeri语言的适当规则，则可以强制字体使用遵循类似规则的土耳其字形。

trans-unit.source: The font-optical-sizingCSS property sets whether text rendering is optimized for viewing at different sizes.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-optical-sizing CSS属性集是否文本呈现用于观看在不同的尺寸进行优化。

trans-unit.source: The font-optical-sizingCSS sets whether text rendering is optimized for viewing at different sizes. This only works for fonts that have an optical size variation axis.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-optical-sizing CSS设置是否文本呈现用于观看在不同的尺寸进行优化。这仅适用于具有光学尺寸变化轴的字体。

trans-unit.source: The font-size-adjustCSS property sets how the font size should be chosen based on the height of lowercase rather than capital letters.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-size-adjust CSS属性设置怎样的字体大小应根据小写字母而不是大写字母的高度来选择。

trans-unit.source: The font-size-adjustCSS property sets the size of lower-case letters relative to the current font size (which defines the size of upper-case letters).
trans-unit.target: 的 font-size-adjust CSS属性设置的相对于当前字体大小（其限定的大写字母的大小）小写字母的大小。

trans-unit.source: The font-size property is specified in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 该 font-size 属性在下列方式之一指定的：

trans-unit.source: The font-sizeCSS property sets the size of the font. Changing the font size also updates the sizes of the font size-relative <length> units, such as em, ex, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-size CSS属性设置字体的大小。更改字体大小还会更新相对于字体大小的 <length> 单位的大小，例如 em ， ex 等。

trans-unit.source: The font-sizeCSS property sets the size of the font. This property is also used to compute the size of em, ex, and other relative <length> units.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-size CSS属性设置字体的大小。此属性还用于计算 em ， ex 和其他相对 <length> 单位的大小。

trans-unit.source: The font-smoothCSS property controls the application of anti-aliasing when fonts are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 呈现字体时， font-smooth CSS属性控制抗锯齿的应用。

trans-unit.source: The font-stretch CSS descriptor allows authors to specify a normal, condensed, or expanded face for the fonts specified in the @font-face rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-stretch CSS描述符允许作者指定一个正常的，凝结，或面对扩大在指定的字体 @font-face 的规则。

trans-unit.source: The font-stretchCSS property selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-stretch CSS属性选择从字体一个正常的，冷凝，或扩展面。

trans-unit.source: The font-style CSS descriptor allows authors to specify font styles for the fonts specified in the @font-face rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-style CSS描述符允许作者指定在指定的字体的字体样式 @font-face 的规则。

trans-unit.source: The font-style property is specified as a single keyword chosen from the list of values below, which can optionally include an angle if the keyword is oblique.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-style 属性被指定为从下面的值的列表，其可任选包括一个角度如果关键字是选择一个关键字 oblique 。

trans-unit.source: The font-synthesis CSS property controls which missing typefaces, bold or italic, may be synthesized by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-synthesis 哪个丢失字体，粗体或斜体CSS属性控制，可以通过浏览器来合成。

trans-unit.source: The font-synthesisCSS property controls which missing typefaces, bold or italic, may be synthesized by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-synthesis CSS哪个丢失字体，粗体或斜体属性控制，可以通过浏览器来合成。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-alternates CSS property controls the usage of alternate glyphs. These alternate glyphs may be referenced by alternative names defined in @font-feature-values.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-variant-alternates CSS属性控制替代字形的使用。这些备用字形可以由 @font-feature-values 定义的备用名称引用。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-caps property is specified using a single keyword value from the list below. In each case, if the font doesn't support the OpenType value, then it synthesizes the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-variant-caps 属性指定使用从下面的列表中的单个关键字值。在每种情况下，如果字体不支持OpenType值，则它将合成字形。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-capsCSS property controls the use of alternate glyphs for capital letters.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-variant-caps CSS属性控制使用了大写字母替代字形的。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-east-asian CSS property controls the use of alternate glyphs for East Asian scripts, like Japanese and Chinese.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-variant-east-asian CSS属性控制使用替代字形的东亚脚本，如日本和中国。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-ligatures CSS property controls which ligatures and contextual forms are used in textual content of the elements it applies to. This leads to more harmonized forms in the resulting text.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-variant-ligatures ，其CSS属性控制连字和上下文的形式在它适用于元素的文本内容被使用。这导致结果文本中的形式更加统一。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-ligatures property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-variant-ligatures 属性指定为下面列出的关键字值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-numeric CSS property controls the usage of alternate glyphs for numbers, fractions, and ordinal markers.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-variant-numeric CSS属性控制替代字形的数字，级分，和序标记物的使用。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-position CSS property controls the use of alternate, smaller glyphs that are positioned as superscript or subscript.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-variant-position CSS属性控制使用替代的，更小的字形被定位为标或下标。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant-position property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-variant-position 特性被指定为下面列出的关键字值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant CSS shorthand property allows you to set all the font variants for the fonts specified in the @font-face rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-variant CSS速记属性允许您设置的所有在指定的字体的字体变 @font-face 的规则。

trans-unit.source: The font-variant CSS shorthand property allows you to set all the font variants for a font.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-variant CSS速记属性允许您设置字体的所有字体变体。

trans-unit.source: The font-variation-settings CSS descriptor allows authors to specify low-level OpenType or TrueType font variations in the @font-face rule.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-variation-settings CSS描述符允许作者指定的低级别的OpenType或TrueType字体的变化 @font-face 的规则。

trans-unit.source: The font-variation-settings CSS property provides low-level control over variable font characteristics, by specifying the four letter axis names of the characteristics you want to vary, along with their values.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-variation-settings CSS属性提供了低级别的控制变量字体的特点，通过指定你想改变，以及它们的值的特点，四个字母轴名称。

trans-unit.source: The font-weight CSS descriptor allows authors to specify font weights for the fonts specified in the @font-face rule. The font-weight property can separately be used to set how thick or thin characters in text should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 该 font-weight CSS描述符允许作者指定在指定的字体的字体粗细 @font-face 的规则。的 font-weight 属性可单独用于设定在文本厚或薄的字符应当被显示。

trans-unit.source: The font-weight property is described using any one of the values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-weight 属性使用下面列出的值中的任意一个所述。

trans-unit.source: The font-weight property is specified using any one of the values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-weight 属性使用下面所列的值中的任一个指定。

trans-unit.source: The font-weightCSS property specifies the weight (or boldness) of the font. The font weights available to you will depend on the font-family you are using. Some fonts are only available in normal and bold.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-weight CSS属性指定字体的重量（或魄力）。可用的字体粗细将取决于您使用的 font-family 。某些字体仅以 normal 和 bold 。

trans-unit.source: The font-weightCSS property sets the weight (or boldness) of the font. The weights available depend on the font-family that is currently set.
trans-unit.target: 的 font-weight CSS属性设置字体的重量（或魄力）。可用的权重取决于当前设置的 font-family 。

trans-unit.source: The font CSS shorthand property sets all the different properties of an element's font. Alternatively, it sets an element's font to a system font.
trans-unit.target: 该 font CSS缩写属性设置所有的元素字体的不同属性。或者，它将元素的字体设置为系统字体。

trans-unit.source: The font CSS property is a shorthand for font-style, font-variant, font-weight, font-size, line-height, and font-family. Alternatively, it sets an element's font to a system font.
trans-unit.target: 该 font CSS属性是一个速记 font-style ， font-variant ， font-weight ， font-size ， line-height 和 font-family 。或者，它将元素的字体设置为系统字体。

trans-unit.source: The font property may be specified as either a single keyword, which will select a system font, or as a shorthand for various font-related properties.
trans-unit.target: 所述 font 属性可被指定为单个关键字，这将选择一个系统字体，或作为各种字体相关的属性的略写。

trans-unit.source: The force-end keyword is recognized but has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 该 force-end 关键字识别，但没有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: The forced-colors media feature indicates whether or not the browser is currently in forced-colors mode.
trans-unit.target: 该 forced-colors 的媒体功能指示浏览器是否是目前在强制的色彩模式。

trans-unit.source: The forced-colorsCSSmedia feature is used to detect if the user agent has enabled a forced colors mode where it enforces a user-chosen limited color palette on the page.
trans-unit.target: 该 forced-colors CSS媒体特征用于如果检测用户代理，使强制颜色模式，其中它强制页面上的用户选择的有限调色板。

trans-unit.source: The fr unit and flex-basis
trans-unit.target: 该 fr 单元和 flex-basis

trans-unit.source: The frames() functional notation defines a frames function dividing the domain of output values into equidistant intervals. The difference between frames() and steps() is that with frames(), the start (0%) and end (100%) states are shown for an equal amount of time to the other intervals.
trans-unit.target: 的 frames() 函数表示法定义了帧函数除以输出值的域分成等间隔。 frames() 和 steps() 之间的区别在于，使用 frames() 时，开始状态（0％）和结束状态（100％）的显示时间与其他时间间隔相同。

trans-unit.source: The from-image and flip keywords have been added.
trans-unit.target: 该 from-image 和 flip 关键字已添加。

trans-unit.source: The gap properties
trans-unit.target: 该 gap 性质

trans-unit.source: The gap property is a shorthand for row-gap and column-gap, which allows us to set these properties at once:
trans-unit.target: 该 gap 的属性是一个速记 row-gap 和 column-gap ，这使我们能够在一次设置这些属性：

trans-unit.source: The gapCSS property sets the gaps (gutters) between rows and columns. It is a shorthand for row-gap and column-gap.
trans-unit.target: 的 gap CSS属性设置的间隙（沟的行和列之间）。这是一个简写为 row-gap 和 column-gap 。

trans-unit.source: The grid-area CSS shorthand property specifies a grid item’s size and location within a grid by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the edges of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-area CSS速记属性指定了一个内的网格项的大小和位置网格通过贡献一条线，一个跨度，或全无（自动）将其放置网格，从而指定其边缘网格区域。

trans-unit.source: The grid-area CSS property is a shorthand property for grid-row-start, grid-column-start, grid-row-end and grid-column-end, specifying a grid item’s size and location within the grid row by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the edges of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-area 的CSS属性是一个速记财产 grid-row-start ， grid-column-start ， grid-row-end 和 grid-column-end ，指定范围内的网格项目的大小和位置网格行通过促进一行，跨度或对网格放置没有任何影响（自动），从而指定其网格区域的边缘。

trans-unit.source: The grid-area property
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-area 属性

trans-unit.source: The grid-auto-columns CSS property specifies the size of an implicitly-created grid column track or pattern of tracks.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-auto-columns CSS属性指定的隐含创建的网格列的大小轨道或轨道的模式。

trans-unit.source: The grid-auto-columns CSS property specifies the size of an implicitly-created grid column track.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-auto-columns CSS属性指定的隐含创建的网格列的大小轨道。

trans-unit.source: The grid-auto-flow CSS property controls how the auto-placement algorithm works, specifying exactly how auto-placed items get flowed into the grid.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-auto-flow CSS属性控制自动布局算法如何工作，指定自动放置项目将究竟是如何流入电网。

trans-unit.source: The grid-auto-rows CSS property specifies the size of an implicitly-created grid row track or pattern of tracks.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-auto-rows CSS属性指定的隐含创建的网格行的大小轨道或轨道的模式。

trans-unit.source: The grid-auto-rows CSS property specifies the size of an implicitly-created grid row track.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-auto-rows CSS属性指定的隐含创建的网格行的轨道的大小。

trans-unit.source: The grid-column-end CSS property specifies a grid item’s end position within the grid column by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the block-end edge of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-column-end CSS属性通过贡献一条线，一个跨度，或全无（自动）将其放置网格，从而指定其的块尾端指定网格列内的网格项的结束位置网格区域。

trans-unit.source: The grid-column-start CSS property specifies a grid item’s start position within the grid column by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement. This start position defines the block-start edge of the grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-column-start CSS属性通过贡献线，跨度，或没有（自动）将其放置格指定网格列内的网格项目的起始位置。该起始位置定义了网格区域的块起始边缘。

trans-unit.source: The grid-column CSS shorthand property specifies a grid item's size and location within a grid column by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the inline-start and inline-end edge of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-column CSS速记属性指定了一个内的网格项的大小和位置格列通过贡献一条线，一个跨度，或全无（自动），以它的网格位置，从而指定直列开始和其的直列端缘格区域。

trans-unit.source: The grid-column CSS property is a shorthand property for grid-column-start and grid-column-end specifying a grid item's size and location within the grid column by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the inline-start and inline-end edge of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-column CSS属性是一个速记财产 grid-column-start 和 grid-column-end 指定范围内的网格项目的大小和位置格列通过贡献线，跨度，或没有（自动）将其网格布局，从而指定其grid area的inline-start和inline-end边缘。

trans-unit.source: The grid-column and grid-row shorthands
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-column 和 grid-row 简写

trans-unit.source: The grid-row-end CSS property specifies a grid item’s end position within the grid row by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the inline-end edge of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-row-end CSS属性通过贡献一条线，一个跨度，或全无（自动）将其放置网格，从而指定其的一字形端边缘指定网格行内的网格项的结束位置网格区域。

trans-unit.source: The grid-row-start CSS property specifies a grid item’s start position within the grid row by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the inline-start edge of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-row-start 的CSS属性指定通过贡献一条线，一个跨度，或全无（自动）将其放置网格，从而指定其的直列开始边缘的网格行内的网格项的开始位置网格区域。

trans-unit.source: The grid-row CSS shorthand property specifies a grid item’s size and location within the grid row by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the inline-start and inline-end edge of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 的 grid-row CSS简写属性通过贡献一条线，一个跨度，或全无（自动），以它的网格位置，从而指定指定网格行内的网格项的大小和位置直列开始和其的直列端缘格区域。

trans-unit.source: The grid-row CSS property is a shorthand property for grid-row-start and grid-row-end specifying a grid item’s size and location within the grid row by contributing a line, a span, or nothing (automatic) to its grid placement, thereby specifying the inline-start and inline-end edge of its grid area.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-row CSS属性是一个速记财产 grid-row-start 和 grid-row-end 通过贡献线，跨度，或没有（自动），以它的网格布局指定网格行内的网格项目的大小和位置，从而指定其grid area的inline-start和inline-end边缘。

trans-unit.source: The grid-template-areas CSS property specifies named grid areas, establishing the cells in the grid and assigning them names.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-template-areas CSS属性指定命名网格区，网格建立的细胞并赋予它们的名字。

trans-unit.source: The grid-template-areas CSS property specifies named grid areas.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-template-areas CSS属性指定命名网格区域。

trans-unit.source: The grid-template-columns CSS property defines the line names and track sizing functions of the grid columns.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-template-columns CSS属性定义的行名称和曲目上浆功能网格列。

trans-unit.source: The grid-template-rows CSS property defines the line names and track sizing functions of the grid rows.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-template-rows CSS属性定义的行名称和曲目上浆功能网格行。

trans-unit.source: The grid-template CSS property is a shorthand property for defining grid columns, rows, and areas.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-template CSS属性是一个简写属性，用于定义网格列，行和领域。

trans-unit.source: The grid-template CSS property is a shorthand property for defining grid columns, rows, and areas.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid-template CSS属性是一个速记定义属性的网格列，行和领域。

trans-unit.source: The grid CSS property is a shorthand property that sets all of the explicit and implicit grid properties in a single declaration.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid 的CSS属性是一个速记属性，设置所有的显性和隐性的网格属性的一个声明。

trans-unit.source: The grid CSS property is a shorthand property that sets all of the explicit grid properties (grid-template-rows, grid-template-columns, and grid-template-areas), and all the implicit grid properties (grid-auto-rows, grid-auto-columns, and grid-auto-flow), in a single declaration.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid 的CSS属性是一个简写属性，将所有明确的网格属性（的 grid-template-rows ， grid-template-columns ，和 grid-template-areas ），所有的隐含网格属性（ grid-auto-rows ， grid-auto-columns 和 grid-auto-flow ），在一个声明中。

trans-unit.source: The grid feature is specified as a <mq-boolean> value (0 or 1) representing whether or not the ouput device is grid-based.
trans-unit.target: 的 grid 特征被指定为 <mq-boolean> 值（ 0 或 1 表示是否在输出中装置）是基于网格的。

trans-unit.source: The gridCSSmedia feature can be used to test whether the output device uses a grid-based screen.
trans-unit.target: 该 grid CSS 媒体特征输出设备是否使用基于网格的屏幕可用于测试。

trans-unit.source: The handleOrientationChange() function would look at the result of the query and handle whatever we need to do on an orientation change:
trans-unit.target: 该 handleOrientationChange() 函数将查看查询和处理这一切，我们需要在改变方向时做的结果是：

trans-unit.source: The hanging-punctuation property may be specified with one, two, or three values.
trans-unit.target: 该 hanging-punctuation 属性可能有一个，两个或三个值来指定。

trans-unit.source: The hanging-punctuationCSS property specifies whether a punctuation mark should hang at the start or end of a line of text. Hanging punctuation may be placed outside the line box.
trans-unit.target: 该 hanging-punctuation CSS属性指定一个标点符号是否应在开始挂起或文本行的结束。悬挂标点符号可以放在线框的外面。

trans-unit.source: The height CSS property specifies the height of an element. By default, the property defines the height of the content area. If box-sizing is set to border-box, however, it instead determines the height of the border area.
trans-unit.target: 该 height CSS属性指定元素的高度。默认情况下，该属性定义内容区域的高度。但是，如果将 box-sizing 设置为 border-box ，则它将确定border area的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height feature is specified as a <length> value representing the viewport height. It is a range feature, meaning that you can also use the prefixed min-height and max-height variants to query minimum and maximum values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 的 height 特征被指定为 <length> 表示视口的高度值。这是一个范围功能，这意味着您还可以使用前缀的 min-height 和 max-height 变体分别查询最小值和最大值。

trans-unit.source: The heightCSSmedia feature can be used to apply styles based on the height of the viewport (or the page box, for paged media).
trans-unit.target: 该 height CSS 媒体功能可用于应用基础上的高度样式，视口（或页面中，为页面媒体）。

trans-unit.source: The hoverCSSmedia feature can be used to test whether the user's primary input mechanism can hover over elements.
trans-unit.target: 所述 hover CSS 媒体功能可用于测试用户的是否主要输入机制可以元素悬停。

trans-unit.source: The html element defines the initial Block Formatting Context (
trans-unit.target: 的 html 元素定义了初始块格式化上下文（

trans-unit.source: The html element is not the only element capable of creating a new
trans-unit.target: 该 html 元素是不能够创建一个新的唯一元素

trans-unit.source: The hue-rotate()CSS function rotates the hue of an element and its contents. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 hue-rotate() CSS功能旋转的元件和其内容物的色调。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The hue-rotate()CSSfunction rotates the hue of an element and its contents. Its result is a <filter-function>.
trans-unit.target: 的 hue-rotate() CSS功能旋转的元件和其内容物的色调。其结果是 <filter-function> 。

trans-unit.source: The hyphens property is specified as a single keyword value chosen from the list below.
trans-unit.target: 该 hyphens 属性被指定为从下面的列表中选择一个关键字值。

trans-unit.source: The hyphensCSS property specifies how words should be hyphenated when text wraps across multiple lines. You can prevent hyphenation entirely, use hyphenation in manually-specified points within the text, or let the browser automatically insert hyphens where appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 该 hyphens CSS属性指定的话应该在多行文本包裹时被断字。您可以完全防止连字符，可以在文本中的手动指定点中使用连字符，也可以让浏览器在适当的地方自动插入连字符。

trans-unit.source: The hyphensCSS property specifies how words should be hyphenated when text wraps across multiple lines. It can prevent hyphenation entirely, hyphenate at manually-specified points within the text, or let the browser automatically insert hyphens where appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 该 hyphens CSS属性指定的话应该在多行文本包裹时被断字。它可以完全防止连字符，可以在文本中的手动指定点处连字符，也可以让浏览器在适当的地方自动插入连字符。

trans-unit.source: The image()CSSfunction defines an <image> in a similar fashion to the <url> function, but with added functionality including specifying the image's directionality, specifying fallback images for when the preferred image is not supported, displaying just a part of that image defined by a media fragment, and specifying a solid color as a fallback in case none of the specified images are able to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 的 image() CSS功能定义 <image> 以类似的方式与 <url> 的功能，但与包含指定图像的方向性，在不支持的优选图像指定回退图像附加功能，显示仅有的那部分媒体片段定义的图像，并指定纯色作为后备，以防指定图像无法渲染。

trans-unit.source: The image-orientationCSS property specifies a layout-independent correction to the orientation of an image. It should not be used for any other orientation adjustments; instead, the transform property should be used with the rotate<transform-function>.
trans-unit.target: image-orientation CSS属性指定对图像方向的与布局无关的校正。不应将其用于任何其他方向调整；取而代之的是， transform 属性应该与 rotate <transform-function> 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The image-renderingCSS property sets an image scaling algorithm. The property applies to an element itself, to any images set in its other properties, and to its descendants.
trans-unit.target: 在 image-rendering CSS属性设置的图像缩放算法。该属性适用于元素本身，其其他属性中设置的任何图像及其后代。

trans-unit.source: The image-set()CSSfunction notation is a method of letting the browser pick the most appropriate CSS image from a given set, primarily for high pixel density screens.
trans-unit.target: 所述 image-set() CSS功能表示法是让浏览器从一组给定选择最适当的CSS图象，主要用于高像素密度屏幕的方法。

trans-unit.source: The ime-mode property is only partially and inconsistently implemented in browsers. It was introduced by Microsoft with Internet Explorer 5 as a proprietary extension: -ms-ime-mode Attribute | imeMode Property.
trans-unit.target: 该 ime-mode 属性仅部分和不一致在浏览器中实现。它是由Microsoft随Internet Explorer 5引入的专有扩展：-ms-ime-mode imeMode属性。

trans-unit.source: The ime-mode property is only partially and inconsistently implemented in browsers. It was introduced by Microsoft with Internet Explorer 5 as a proprietary extension: -ms-ime-mode Attribute | imeMode Property.
The ime-mode property is specified using one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 在 ime-mode 属性使用下面列出的关键字值中的一个指定。

trans-unit.source: The ime-modeCSS property controls the state of the input method editor (IME) for text fields. This property is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 在 ime-mode CSS属性控制文本字段的输入方法编辑器（IME）的状态。该属性已过时。

trans-unit.source: The inherit CSS keyword causes the element for which it is specified to take the computed value of the property from its parent element. It can be applied to any CSS property, including the CSS shorthand all.
trans-unit.target: 所述 inherit CSS关键字使对于其被指定为取该元素计算值从它的父元素的属性。它可以应用于任何CSS属性，包括CSS速记 all 。

trans-unit.source: The initial CSS keyword applies the initial (or default) value of a property to an element. It can be applied to any CSS property. This includes the CSS shorthand all, with which initial can be used to restore all CSS properties to their initial state.
trans-unit.target: 的 initial CSS关键字应用于初始（或默认）值的属性的一个元素。可以将其应用于任何CSS属性。这包括CSS简写 all ，可使用 initial 来将所有CSS属性还原到初始状态。

trans-unit.source: The initial CSS keyword applies the initial (or default) value of a property to an element. The inital value should not be confused with the value specified by the browser's style sheet. It can be applied to any CSS property. This includes the CSS shorthand all, with which initial can be used to restore all CSS properties to their initial state.
trans-unit.target: 的 initial CSS关键字应用于初始（或默认）值的属性的一个元素。初始值不应与浏览器的样式表指定的值混淆。可以将其应用于任何CSS属性。这包括CSS简写 all ，可使用 initial 来将所有CSS属性还原到初始状态。

trans-unit.source: The initial keyword represents the value specified as the property’s initial value. The inherit keyword represents the computed value of the property on the element’s parent, provided it is inherited.
trans-unit.target: 在 initial 关键字代表指定为属性的初始值的值。所述 inherit 关键字表示属性对元素的父的计算值，只要它是遗传的。

trans-unit.source: The inline-size property takes the same values as the width and height properties.
trans-unit.target: 该 inline-size 属性取作为相同的值 width 和 height 属性。

trans-unit.source: The inline-sizeCSS property defines the horizontal or vertical size of an element's block, depending on its writing mode. It corresponds to either the width or the height property, depending on the value of writing-mode.
trans-unit.target: 该 inline-size CSS属性定义一个元素的块的水平或垂直尺寸，这取决于它的写入模式。它取决于 width 或 height 属性，具体取决于 writing-mode 的值。

trans-unit.source: The inline-table value does not have a direct mapping in HTML. It behaves like an HTML <table> element, but as an inline box, rather than a block-level box. Inside the table box is a block-level context.
trans-unit.target: 在 inline-table 值没有在HTML的直接映射。它的行为类似于HTML <table> 元素，但作为内联框而不是块级框。在表格框内是一个块级上下文。

trans-unit.source: The inline dimension is the dimension along which a line of text runs in the writing mode in use. Therefore, in an English document with the text running horizontally left to right, or an Arabic document with the text running horizontally right to left, the inline dimension is horizontal. Switch to a vertical writing mode (e.g. a Japanese document) and the inline dimension is now vertical, as lines in that writing mode run vertically.
trans-unit.target: 该 inline 尺寸为沿其中一行文字中所使用的书写模式下运行的维度。因此，在英语文档中，文本从左到右水平排列；或者在阿拉伯语文档中，文本从右到左水平排列，内联尺寸为horizo​​ntal。切换到垂直书写模式（例如，日语文档），由于该书写模式中的线垂直延伸，因此内联尺寸现在为垂直。

trans-unit.source: The inset() type defines a rectangle, which may not seem very useful as simply floating an item will give you a rectangular shape around it. However the inset() types enables the definition of offsets, thus pulling the content in over the shape.
trans-unit.target: 的 inset() 类型定义了一个矩形，它看起来不是非常有用，因为简单地浮动的项目将会给你它周围的矩形形状。但是， inset() 类型可以定义偏移量，从而将内容拖入形状中。

trans-unit.source: The inset-block-end property takes the same values as the left property.
trans-unit.target: 的 inset-block-end 属性采用相同的值作为 left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The inset-block-endCSS property defines the logical block end offset of an element, which maps to a physical inset depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the top, right, bottom, or left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 的 inset-block-end CSS属性定义的逻辑块端部的元件，其映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的物理插图的偏移量。它对应于 top ， right ， bottom 或 left 属性，取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The inset-block-start property takes the same values as the left property.
trans-unit.target: 在 inset-block-start 属性采用相同的值 left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The inset-block-startCSS property defines the logical block start offset of an element, which maps to a physical inset depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the top, right, bottom, or left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 的 inset-block-start CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向的物理插块的逻辑块开始偏移。它对应于 top ， right ， bottom 或 left 属性，取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The inset-block-startCSS property defines the logical block start offset of an element, which maps to a physical offset depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. It corresponds to the top, right, bottom, or left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.
trans-unit.target: 的 inset-block-start CSS属性定义的元素，它映射到物理的逻辑块开始偏移抵消取决于元件的写入模式，方向性，和文本方向。它对应于 top ， right ， bottom 或 left 属性，具体取决于为 writing-mode ， direction 和 text-orientation 定义的值。

trans-unit.source: The inverted-colorsCSSmedia feature can be used to test whether the user agent or underlying OS is inverting colors.
trans-unit.target: 所述 inverted-colors CSS 媒体功能可在是否可用于测试用户代理或底层操作系统是反相的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The isolation property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 将 isolation 属性指定为下面列出的关键字值之一。

trans-unit.source: The isolationCSS property determines whether an element must create a new stacking context.
trans-unit.target: 该 isolation CSS属性确定元素是否必须创建一个新的堆叠内容。

trans-unit.source: The justify-content property accepts the same values as align-content.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-content 属性接受为相同的值 align-content 。

trans-unit.source: The justify-tracks CSS property sets the alignment in the masonry axis for grid containers that have masonry in their inline axis.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-tracks CSS属性集砌体的定向轴具有网格容器砖石在他们的内联轴。

trans-unit.source: The justify-tracks property works in the same way as align-tracks, however it is used when the masonry axis is the inline axis.
trans-unit.target: 该 justify-tracks 物业工作在相同的方式，对齐，轨道，但它是用来当砌筑轴是字形轴。

trans-unit.source: The leftCSS property participates in specifying the horizontal position of a positioned element. It has no effect on non-positioned elements.
trans-unit.target: 的 left CSS属性参与了指定的水平位置定位的元素。它对未定位的元素没有影响。

trans-unit.source: The letter-spacingCSS property sets the horizontal spacing behavior between text characters. This value is added to the natural spacing between characters while rendering the text. Positive values of letter-spacing causes characters to spread farther apart, while negative values of letter-spacing bring characters closer together.
trans-unit.target: 该 letter-spacing CSS属性设置文本字符之间的水平间距行为。渲染文本时，此值将添加到字符之间的自然间距。 letter-spacing 正值会导致字符散开得更远，而 letter-spacing 负值会使字符靠得更近。

trans-unit.source: The letter-spacingCSS property sets the spacing behavior between text characters.
trans-unit.target: 该 letter-spacing CSS属性设置文本字符之间的间距行为。

trans-unit.source: The light-levelCSSmedia feature can be used to test the ambient light level.
trans-unit.target: 所述 light-level CSS 媒体功能可用于测试的环境光水平。

trans-unit.source: The line-break CSS property sets how to break lines of Chinese, Japanese, or Korean (CJK) text when working with punctuation and symbols.
trans-unit.target: 该 line-break CSS属性设置有标点符号工作时，如何打破中国人，日语或韩语（CJK）文本行。

trans-unit.source: The line-height-step CSS property sets the step unit for line box heights. When the property is set, line box heights are rounded up to the closest multiple of the unit.
trans-unit.target: 所述 line-height-step CSS属性设置为线框的高度的步骤单元。设置该属性后，线框的高度将四舍五入到该单位的最接近倍数。

trans-unit.source: The line-height-step property is specified as any one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 所述 line-height-step 属性指定为以下的任何一个：

trans-unit.source: The line-height property is specified as any one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 所述 line-height 属性指定为以下的任何一个：

trans-unit.source: The line-heightCSS property sets the amount of space used for lines, such as in text. On block-level elements, it specifies the minimum height of line boxes within the element. On non-replaced inline elements, it specifies the height that is used to calculate line box height.
trans-unit.target: 所述 line-height 的CSS属性设置的空间用于线，如在文本的量。在块级元素上，它指定元素内线框的最小高度。在未替换的内联元素上，它指定用于计算线盒高度的高度。

trans-unit.source: The line-heightCSS property sets the height of a line box. It's commonly used to set the distance between lines of text. On block-level elements, it specifies the minimum height of line boxes within the element. On non-replaced inline elements, it specifies the height that is used to calculate line box height.
trans-unit.target: 该 line-height CSS属性设置行框的高度。通常用于设置文本行之间的距离。在块级元素上，它指定元素内线框的最小高度。在未替换的内联元素上，它指定用于计算线盒高度的高度。

trans-unit.source: The linear-gradient()CSS function creates an image consisting of a progressive transition between two or more colors along a straight line. Its result is an object of the <gradient> data type, which is a special kind of <image>.
trans-unit.target: 的 linear-gradient() CSS功能创建由沿直线两种或多种颜色之间的渐进转换的图像。其结果是 <gradient> 数据类型的对象，这是 <image> 的一种特殊类型。

trans-unit.source: The linear-gradient()CSSfunction creates an image consisting of a progressive transition between two or more colors along a straight line. Its result is an object of the <gradient> data type, which is a special kind of <image>.
trans-unit.target: 的 linear-gradient() CSS功能创建由沿直线两种或多种颜色之间的渐进转换的图像。其结果是 <gradient> 数据类型的对象，这是 <image> 的一种特殊类型。

trans-unit.source: The list-item keyword causes the element to generate a ::marker pseudo-element with the content specified by its list-style properties (for example a bullet point) together with a principal box of the specified type for its own contents.
trans-unit.target: 该 list-item 关键字使以产生该元件 ::marker 与它的指定的内容伪元素 list-style 与指定类型为它自己的内容的主盒一起特性（例如子弹点）。

trans-unit.source: The list-style-imageCSS property sets an image to be used as the list item marker.
trans-unit.target: 该 list-style-image CSS属性设置为可以用作列表项标记的图像。

trans-unit.source: The list-style-position property is specified as one of the keyword values listed below.
trans-unit.target: 的 list-style-position 属性指定为下面列出的关键字值中的一个。

trans-unit.source: The list-style-positionCSS property sets the position of the ::marker relative to a list item.
trans-unit.target: 该 list-style-position CSS属性设置的位置 ::marker 相对于列表项目。

trans-unit.source: The list-style CSS shorthand property allows you set all the list style properties at once.
trans-unit.target: 该 list-style CSS速记属性允许您一次设置所有的列表样式属性。

trans-unit.source: The list-style CSS property is a shorthand to set list style properties list-style-type, list-style-image, and list-style-position.
trans-unit.target: 该 list-style 的CSS属性是一个简写来设置列表样式属性 list-style-type ， list-style-image 和 list-style-position 。

trans-unit.source: The list-style property is specified as one, two, or three keywords in any order. If list-style-type and list-style-image are both set, then list-style-type is used as a fallback if the image is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 该 list-style 属性指定为以任意顺序一个，两个或三个关键字。如果同时设置了 list-style-type 和 list-style-image ，则如果图像不可用，则将 list-style-type 用作后备。

trans-unit.source: The margin-block-end property takes the same values as the margin-left property.
trans-unit.target: 的 margin-block-end 属性采用相同的值 margin-left 属性。

trans-unit.source: The margin-bottom property is specified as the keyword auto, or a <length>, or a <percentage>. Its value can be positive, zero, or negative.
trans-unit.target: 的 margin-bottom 属性指定为关键字 auto ，或 <length> 或 <percentage> 。其值可以为正，零或负。

trans-unit.source: The margin-bottomCSS property sets the margin area on the bottom of an element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.
trans-unit.target: 的 margin-bottom CSS属性设置页边空白区域上的元件的底部。正值会使它离邻居更远，而负值会使它更近。

trans-unit.source: The margin-box is the shape defined by the outside margin edge and includes the corner radius of the shape, should border-radius have been used in defining the element.
trans-unit.target: 的 margin-box 是由外侧缘边缘限定的形状，并且包括所述形状的拐角半径，应该 border-radius 已经在定义元件使用。

trans-unit.source: The margin-box value is unsupported.
trans-unit.target: 该 margin-box 值不受支持。

trans-unit.source: The margin-inline-endCSS property defines the logical inline end margin of an element, which maps to a physical margin depending on the element's writing mode, directionality, and text orientation. In other words, it corresponds to the margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom or margin-left property depending on the values defined for writing-mode, direction, and text-orientation.

trans-unit.source: The margin-inline-start property takes the same values as the margin-left property.

trans-unit.source: The margin-left property is specified as the keyword auto, or a <length>, or a <percentage>. Its value can be positive, zero, or negative.
trans-unit.target: 的 margin-left 属性被指定为关键字 auto ，或 <length> 或 <percentage> 。其值可以为正，零或负。

trans-unit.source: The margin-leftCSS property sets the margin area on the left side of an element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.
trans-unit.target: 在 margin-left CSS属性设置的边缘区域上的元素的左侧。正值会使它离邻居更远，而负值会使它更近。

trans-unit.source: The margin-right property is specified as the keyword auto, or a <length>, or a <percentage>. Its value can be positive, zero, or negative.
trans-unit.target: 的 margin-right 属性指定为关键字 auto ，或 <length> 或 <percentage> 。其值可以为正，零或负。

trans-unit.source: The margin-rightCSS property sets the margin area on the right side of an element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.

trans-unit.source: The margin-top property is specified as the keyword auto, or a <length>, or a <percentage>. Its value can be positive, zero, or negative.
trans-unit.target: 的 margin-top 属性指定为关键字 auto ，或 <length> 或 <percentage> 。其值可以为正，零或负。

trans-unit.source: The margin-topCSS property sets the margin area on the top of an element. A positive value places it farther from its neighbors, while a negative value places it closer.
trans-unit.target: 该 margin-top CSS属性设置的边缘区域上的元素的顶部。正值会使它离邻居更远，而负值会使它更近。

trans-unit.source: The margin-trim property allows the container to trim the margins of its children where they adjoin the container’s edges.
trans-unit.target: 该 margin-trim 属性允许容器以削减其孩子在那里毗邻容器的边缘的边缘。

trans-unit.source: The margin property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values. Each value is a <length>, a <percentage>, or the keyword auto. Negative values draw the element closer to its neighbors than it would be by default.
trans-unit.target: 该 margin 属性可使用一个，两个，三个，或四个值来指定。每个值都是 <length> ， <percentage> 或关键字 auto 。负值使元素比默认情况下更靠近其邻居。

trans-unit.source: The margin property may be specified using one, two, three, or four values. Each value is a <length>, a <percentage>, or the keyword auto. Negative values draw the element closer to its neighbors than it would be by default.
trans-unit.target: 该 margin 属性可使用一个，两个，三个，或四个值来指定。每个值都是 <length> ， <percentage> 或关键字 auto 。负值使元素比默认情况下更靠近其邻居。

trans-unit.source: The marginCSS property sets the margin area on all four sides of an element. It is a shorthand for margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, and margin-left.
trans-unit.target: 该 margin CSS属性设置的边缘区域上的元素的所有四个侧面。这是一个简写为 margin-top ， margin-right ， margin-bottom ，和 margin-left 。

trans-unit.source: The marginCSS property sets the margin area on all four sides of an element. It is a shorthand for margin-top, margin-right, margin-bottom, and margin-left.
